allItems.Name: Base Salvage Capsule
allItems.Description:
A construction recovery device.

This optional piece of base technology stores and preserves matter left over after the destruction of a previous base.

allItems.Name: Atmosphere Harvester
allItems.Description: An automated siphon unit for the collection of valuable gases. Once activated, the harvester condenses and compresses substances from the air over time. Compressed gas is then stored safely until collected.

allItems.Name: Gamma Weed
allItems.Description:
A luminous, leafy flowering plant that thrives in radioactive biomes and can be cultivated to yield a bountiful harvest.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Radioactive climate before planting outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 4 hours

allItems.Name: Fungal Cluster
allItems.Description:
A spherical fungus with internal gills, found only in toxic biomes. Fungal Clusters can be transplanted for cultivation, yielding a bountiful harvest.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Toxic climate before planting outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 4 hours

allItems.Name: Frostwort
allItems.Description:
A large crystal flower with radiant blue blooms, found only in snowy biomes. Frostwort can be farmed and makes a reliable crop, and its adaptation to harsh conditions results in highly frequent harvests.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Frozen climate before planting outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 1 hour

allItems.Name: Venom Urchin
allItems.Description:
A small, innocuous looking plant whose leaves periodically secrete a small amount of potent Sac Venom, a valuable trading commodity.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Cannot be planted outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 3 hours 20 mins

allItems.Name: Solar Vine
allItems.Description:
This 'living rock' is adapted to live in the extreme heat of scorched biomes. However, it can be farmed in most environments and, once established, yields a moderate harvest.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Hot climate before planting outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 16 hours

allItems.Name: Gutrot Flower
allItems.Description:
A foul-smelling, farmable flower that replicates the chemical structure of faecal matter. When planted inside, yields a harvest of Faecium.

A good alternative to collecting Faecium by hand, which requires feeding creatures and then harvesting their droppings. Gutrot Flowers must be grown in a Hydroponics Tray.

Approximate growing time: 4 hours

allItems.Name: Gravitino Host
allItems.Description:
A strange, potentially parasitic plant that yields an occasional harvest of the highly tradable commodity, Gravitino Balls.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Cannot be planted outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 2 hours

allItems.Name: Mordite Root
allItems.Description:
An inedible tuber that produces a small yield of Mordite crystals.

A peaceful alternative to the process of harvesting Mordite from the corpses of creatures. Mordite Root must be grown in a Hydroponics Tray.

Approximate growing time: 8 hours

allItems.Name: Echinocactus
allItems.Description:
Native to barren biomes and capable of withstanding long periods of drought, Echinocactus is an edible succulent that responds well to cultivation, yielding a large but occasional harvest.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Barren climate before planting outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 16 hours

allItems.Name: Star Bramble
allItems.Description:
A medium-sized, farmable plant that yields an occasional harvest of valuable Star Bulbs.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Ensure Lush climate before planting outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 4 hours

allItems.Name: Albumen Pearl Orb
allItems.Description:
A medium-sized, farmable Crystal Orb that yields an occasional harvest of valuable Albumen Pearls.

Suitable for hydroponic indoor planting. Cannot be planted outdoors.

Approximate growing time: 80 mins

allItems.Name: NipNip
allItems.Description:
This medicinal herb is known for its pungent buds, which are harvested to produce Gek Nip. NipNip thrives in dank environments, and often grows as a weed.

Suitable for hydroponic planting indoors. Needs a tropical or humid climate before planting outdoors.

allItems.Name: Wall

Reinforced Wall Module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibility with other prefab structures. Rapid grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts.

This statue depicts a primitive ancient creature, sought after by many early explorers.

allItems.Description:
An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in bronze.
This statue is a decorative replica of an Atlas Interface. Its core rotates, powered by an unknown force...

allItems.Description:
An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in bronze.
This astronaut statue is a tribute to all galactic explorers.

allItems.Name: Silver Astronaut Statue
allItems.Description:
An exclusive buildable base ornament, cast in silver.
This astronaut statue is a tribute to all galactic explorers.

This astronaut statue is a tribute to all galactic explorers.

allItems.Name: Galactic Hub Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts an emblem bearing the mission statement: 'Explore Together'.

allItems.Name: Hand of Approval Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts a universal hand gesture signifying approval.

allItems.Name: Nada Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts the Korvax Priest Entity Nada.

allItems.Name: Polo Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts the Gek Specialist Polo.

allItems.Name: Apollo Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts the Traveller Apollo.

allItems.Name: Artemis Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts the Traveller Artemis.

allItems.Name: Null Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts the Traveller Null.

allItems.Name: Robotic Companion
allItems.Description:
A perfectly-programmed and error free drone.

This miniature robot will be a lively presence in your base, bringing joy, laughter and a constant low-level humming to your home.

allItems.Name: Expanding Cube Gadget
allItems.Description:
An exclusive decorative curiosity.

This precisely crafted gadget utilises a localised gravitational field, delighting and fascinating base visitors.

allItems.Name: Holographic Globe Gadget
allItems.Description:
An exclusive decorative curiosity for bases.

This gadget emits a spherical hologram, representative of one of the quintillions of celestial bodies populating the galaxies.

allItems.Name: Fruit Tree
allItems.Description:
A large decorative fruit tree.

Fruit form, toxicity and existence will vary according to local climatic and pollinator conditions.

allItems.Name: Spindle Tree
allItems.Description:
A thin, non-fruiting tree. Root system is integrated with highly-adapted fungal symbiotes.

Supplied with its own mushrooms for ease of establishment. Fungus is non-toxic and non-spreading.

allItems.Name: Evergreen Tree
allItems.Description:
A hardy evergreen tree, able to survive in a wide-range of climates.

Waxy leaves with a silvery underside provide excellent light harvesting abilities, as well as year-round interest and colour.

allItems.Name: Carnivorous Bush
allItems.Description:
A medium-sized decorative plant. Each of its leaves is covered in a thin film of sticky latex. Insects that land on these leaves are slowly absorbed by digestive hormones mixed in with the glue.

Avoid accidental skin contact.

allItems.Name: Dwarf Palm
allItems.Description:
A squat, easily-managed form of the larger palm species.

Place outdoors to attract wildlife and to purify the air.

allItems.Name: Curious Corn
allItems.Description:
Sprouting decorative corn. Comes in a variety of colours. May attract decorative wildlife.

Unable to reproduce naturally. Must be hand-pollinated.

allItems.Name: Small Aquarium
allItems.Description:
A small observatory unit for studying aquatic behaviours.

Completely self-contained, with its own renewable energy source, pump array, and self-cleaning filtration systems.

allItems.Name: Curly Coral
allItems.Description: A delicate marine invertebrate, cultivated for potted growth. Its distinctive looping structure gives it an attractive whimsical appearance.

allItems.Name: Aquatic Crystal
allItems.Description: An eye-catching cluster of crystallised oceanic minerals. These crystals grow in a shard-like structure, and feature an unusual marbled colouration.

allItems.Name: Candelabra Bloom
allItems.Description: A striking plant featuring luminescent, orb-shaped flowers. This domestic variety has adapted to absorb and process oxygen from any source, whether growing on land or underwater.

allItems.Name: Barnacle
allItems.Description:
A tenacious arthropod, naturally found encrusting stationary or slow-moving underwater objects.

This variety can be encouraged to affix itself to a chosen position, adding an aged marine appearance to bases.

allItems.Name: Blue Firework
allItems.Description:
A luxury firework, rich in magnesium and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Pocket Reality Generator
allItems.Description:
An exclusive decorative curiosity for bases.

A model of reality itself, as viewed from the perspective of an impossible observer. Infinite levels of detail wait to be discovered by the viewer with a powerful enough lens.

allItems.Name: Terrarium
allItems.Description:
A small observatory unit for studying animal behaviours.

Completely self-contained, complete with inbuilt nutrient processor, air purifier and faecal disposal system.

allItems.Name: Sail Palm
allItems.Description:
A large-leafed, heat resistant tree.

Its broad fronds are laced with minerals, forming a protective barrier against the harsh sunlight of its native conditions.

allItems.Name: Globe Tree
allItems.Description:
A thin tree with a large, fleshy root system, well adapted to hot climates.

Root bulb may be tapped for a source of drinkable liquid, but this is not advised outside of the most dire circumstances.

allItems.Name: Rock Garden
allItems.Description: A garden module, complete with decorative mineral formation and built-in capillary matting for optimum humidity control.

allItems.Name: Small Wooden Door
allItems.Description: A small door to insert in a wooden doorframe

allItems.Name: Wooden Power Door
allItems.Description:
A power-operated door. Can be connected to a power grid and operated using various switches.

Fashioned from pressure-treated, resin-injected wood.

allItems.Name: Wooden Inner Roof Corner
allItems.Description:
A vital structure roof piece, critical when building angular roofs.

Fashioned from pressure-treated, resin-injected wood.

allItems.Name: Small Metal Door
allItems.Description: A small door to insert in a metal doorframe

allItems.Name: Metal Power Door
allItems.Description:
A power-operated door. Can be connected to a power grid and operated using various switches.

Fashioned from high-strength metal alloys.

allItems.Name: Red Firework
allItems.Description:
A luxury firework, rich in magnesium and cadmium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Metal Inner Roof Corner
allItems.Description:
A vital structure roof piece, critical when building angular roofs.

Fashioned from high-strength metal alloys.

allItems.Name: Small Concrete Door
allItems.Description: A small door to insert in a concrete doorframe

allItems.Name: Concrete Power Door
allItems.Description:
A power-operated door. Can be connected to a power grid and operated using various switches.

Fashioned from reinforced concrete slabs.

allItems.Name: Green Firework
allItems.Description:
A luxury firework, rich in magnesium and emeril. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Concrete Inner Roof Corner
allItems.Description:
A vital structure roof piece, critical when building angular roofs.

Fashioned from reinforced concrete slabs.

allItems.Name: Lantern
allItems.Description: A low-energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

allItems.Name: Anomaly Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts a Traveller Anomaly.

allItems.Name: Wooden Triangle
allItems.Description: A basic flooring piece of wooden construction, this simple shape allows the creation of a huge array of diverse structures.

allItems.Name: Small Wooden Triangle
allItems.Description: A basic flooring piece of wooden construction, this simple shape allows the creation of a huge array of diverse structures.

allItems.Name: Metal Triangle
allItems.Description: A basic flooring piece of metal construction, this simple shape allows the creation of a huge array of diverse structures.

allItems.Name: Small Metal Triangle
allItems.Description: A basic flooring piece of metal construction, this simple shape allows the creation of a huge array of diverse structures.

allItems.Name: Concrete Triangle
allItems.Description: A basic flooring piece of concrete construction, this simple shape allows the creation of a huge array of diverse structures.

allItems.Name: Small Concrete Triangle
allItems.Description: A basic flooring piece of concrete construction, this simple shape allows the creation of a huge array of diverse structures.

allItems.Name: Blue Light
allItems.Description: A coloured light for illuminating and decorating bases.

allItems.Name: Pink Light
allItems.Description: A coloured light for illuminating and decorating bases.

allItems.Name: Yellow Light
allItems.Description: A coloured light for illuminating and decorating bases.

allItems.Name: Green Light
allItems.Description: A coloured light for illuminating and decorating bases.

allItems.Name: Red Light
allItems.Description: A coloured light for illuminating and decorating bases.

allItems.Name: Light Floor
allItems.Description:
A special construction module fashioned entirely from light-emitting panels. Can be used to construct floors of light.

This floor panel may be recoloured before or after placement. Requires power to operate.

allItems.Name: ByteBeat Device
allItems.Description:
An advanced audio generator, allowing the user to synthesise complex musical arrangements.

Multiple devices may be placed in sequence or connected to lights to generate spectacular displays.

allItems.Name: ByteBeat Cable
allItems.Description:
Advanced cabling, designed to link one or more Bytebeat Generators or to connect a Bytebeat Switch to the network.

The signal will synchronize connected lights and device to the generated waveform.

allItems.Name: Bytebeat Switch
allItems.Description: A musical switching device, designed to interpret waveform signals generated by a Bytebeat Generator and output electrical impulses to connected lights and other devices.

allItems.Name: Exosuit Backpack
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

A tough, modular backpack unit. Its styling calls to mind a previous era of exploration.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Rainbow Jetpack Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

Precisely calibrated multi-chromatic injectors alter the Jetpack's output, turning the exhaust trail into a vibrant display of colour.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Antimatter Jetpack Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

Baryon suppressors alter the Jetpack's output, giving a distinct black tint to its signature trail.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Red Jetpack Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

Cadmium injection nozzles add a bold red flair to the Jetpack's output.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Green Jetpack Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

Emeril injection nozzles add a rich green flair to the Jetpack's output.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Blue Jetpack Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

Indium injection nozzles add a dazzling blue flair to the Jetpack's output.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Chromatic Starship Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.

Precisely calibrated multi-chromatic injectors alter the Pulse Engine's output, turning the exhaust trail into a vibrant display of colour.

Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

allItems.Name: Stealth Starship Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.

Baryon suppressors alter the Pulse Engine's output, giving a distinct black tint to its signature trail.

Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

allItems.Name: Cadmium Starship Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.

Cadmium injection nozzles add a bold red flair to the Pulse Engine's output.

Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

allItems.Name: Emeril Starship Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.

Emeril injection nozzles add a rich green flair to the Pulse Engine's output.

Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

allItems.Name: Golden Starship Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship Exhaust Modifier.

Gold injection nozzles add a dazzling gold flair to the Pulse Engine's output.

Install this technology in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

allItems.Name: Writhing Bush
allItems.Description:
A native of radioactive worlds, this curiously meaty succulent seems to sway gently even when the air is still...

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Umbrella Tree
allItems.Description:
This decorative tree has evolved to cope with high levels of background radiation. Its central glowing core attracts wildlife and is in no way a sense organ. It does not watch you.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Entwining Tree
allItems.Description:
This beautiful statement tree thrives in the heat of intense gamma radiation. To ensure survival in non-native environments, a chunk of high-energy material has been embedded in the trunk.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Blistering Mushroom
allItems.Description:
This swollen protuberance grows rapidly from a fine network of underground spores. Greatly improves nearby soil quality.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Watchful Protrusion
allItems.Description:
While this plant can be cultivated as a crop, consumption is not advised.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Tentacle Spire
allItems.Description:
This delightful architectural floral combines two highly popular aesthetics: wriggling tentacles and giant fungi.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Bewitching Cactus
allItems.Description:
Elegant feathery filaments run around this desert plant, increasing the surface area for moisture absorption. They also look very fetching.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Celebratory Cactus
allItems.Description:
Delightful succulent baubles, these lovely plants top their bulbous bodies with a show of beautiful flowers.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Succulent Tree
allItems.Description:
The bark on this tree is misleading. Neither rough nor hard, its flesh is instead soft and moist to the touch. Wrinkles in the surface store extra water for times of hardship.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Hardy Shrub
allItems.Description:
This tough conifer pumps its sap with anti-freezing enzymes, allowing it to survive unimaginably low temperatures.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Frozen Planter
allItems.Description:
A snow-filled stone trough. This is the perfect home for the small, tough plants that grow on ice-bound worlds.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Ancient Conifer
allItems.Description:
This tree lives on an almost geological time scale. Low heat and light levels in their native habitat restrict growth to mere millimeters each season. A sample this size is a botanical marvel.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Marine Rock
allItems.Description:
A pleasing mineral formation, crystalised from oceanic salts. May also contain aquatic fossils and/or lifeforms.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Mineral Arch
allItems.Description:
A remarkable piece of geological geometry. A stable load-bearing arch, infused with curiously angular solid geodes.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Gem-Encrusted Rock
allItems.Description:
Once a discarded byproduct of deep-level crystal mining, the aesthetic value of the rocks is now better appreciated.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Curious Fauna Banner
allItems.Description:
Demonstrate your interest in strange and unusual animal life with this exclusive Personal Flair.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Banner Of The Blob
allItems.Description:
Show off your love of gentle blob-like creatures and their delicious honey with this exclusive Personal Flair.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Specialist Polo Banner
allItems.Description:
Specialist Polo hopes you enjoy this exclusive Personal Flair. May it bring you joy on your travels!

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Priest Entity Nada Banner
allItems.Description:
Bring Priest-Entity Nada into your personal convergence by equipping this exclusive Personal Flair.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Galactic Hub Banner
allItems.Description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair and explore together!

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Fine And Tasty Banner
allItems.Description:
Demonstrate your commitment to delicious pan-galactic cookery with this exclusive Personal Flair.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Orbital Exocraft Materialiser
allItems.Description:
Construction allows the user to summon any owned Exocraft while in the same system as their freighter.

Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Command Menu to ease of use.

allItems.Name: Electrical Cloaking Unit
allItems.Description:
Device to enable a wireless aesthetic in habitable bases.

Constructing the Electrical Cloaking Unit within a powered base will reduce the visual prominence of all local Electrical Wiring. Hidden wires will continue to supply electricity, provided they are sufficiently powered.

allItems.Name: Emergency Heater
allItems.Description: A localised heating unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

allItems.Name: Emergency Light
allItems.Description: An emergency floor light, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

allItems.Name: Floral Canister
allItems.Description: A containment vessel for alien flora, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

allItems.Name: Crew Locker
allItems.Description: A sturdy personal locker, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

allItems.Name: Heavy-Duty Furniture
allItems.Description: Robustly constructed interior decoration, created with the needs of industrial spacefaring in mind.

allItems.Name: Salvage Crate
allItems.Description: A versatile storage unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

allItems.Name: Storage Unit
allItems.Description: A versatile storage unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

allItems.Name: Large Storage Unit
allItems.Description: A versatile storage unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

allItems.Name: Secure Briefcase
allItems.Description: A versatile storage unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

allItems.Name: Crew Footlocker
allItems.Description: A sturdy personal locker, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

allItems.Name: Industrial Bench
allItems.Description: Robustly constructed interior decoration, created with the needs of industrial spacefaring in mind.

allItems.Name: Industrial Pallet
allItems.Description: Robustly constructed interior decoration, created with the needs of industrial spacefaring in mind.

allItems.Name: Industrial Barrel
allItems.Description: A versatile storage unit, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

allItems.Name: Sample Containment
allItems.Description:
A sinister experimental tube, recovered from the wreckage of a derelict freighter.

Internal lifesigns: INDISTINCT

allItems.Name: Hazard Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add a touch of macabre decoration to bases.

This decal serves as a warning to all those who would venture past it.

allItems.Name: Warning Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add a touch of macabre decoration to bases.

This decal depicts the final state of an unfortunate soul.

allItems.Name: Horrific Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add a touch of macabre decoration to bases.

This decal depicts the 'exotic' fauna discovered breeding in the remains of an unlucky intergalactic freighter.

allItems.Name: Tentacled Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add a touch of macabre decoration to bases.

This decal depicts a many-armed sentience, found drifting in the dark places of the universe.

allItems.Name: Appalling Banner
allItems.Description:
Demonstrate your interest in the macabre and the horrific with this exclusive Personal Flair.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Tentacled Banner
allItems.Description:
Express your curiosity about abyssal alien lifeforms with this exclusive Personal Flair.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Detoxified Slime
allItems.Description:
Gelatinous and slowly pulsing, this puddle of living slime smells sweeter than would be imagined.

Though there is no evidence to suggest it would be unsafe to do so, avoid treading on the slime where possible.

allItems.Name: Orange Pustule
allItems.Description:
The flesh of this sinister squash is always warm, and slightly luminous. Despite these strange qualities, it is quite edible, and releases a comforting aroma wherever it grows.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Igneous Crystal
allItems.Description:
A quiet roar sounds from within this natural crystal formation, lava and gas dancing in a perpetual cycle of heating and solidifying. Mesmerising to the eye, but despite the ultrahot core, only slightly warm to the touch.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Igneous Drop
allItems.Description:
This hybrid of egg and rock is known to form around the larvae of certain species, keeping the vulnerable creature warm and protected as it develops over the course of several decades. Membranous splits in the rock's surface expose the ever-shifting molten heart.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Archaic Habitation Heater
allItems.Description:
Although primitive in design, this habitation heater is nonetheless a popular home furnishing. Its hypnotic flames and gentle crackling lend a comforting ambience to any room.

Provides interior decoration opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Beachhead Expedition Banner
allItems.Description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the 'Beachhead' Expedition, and your success in tracking the renegade historical echo.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Beachhead Expedition Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates the collective effort of the Travellers in mapping the Histiographical Flux and tracking the renegade echo during the Beachhead Expedition.

allItems.Name: Saucer Fungus
allItems.Description: This fungal growth, identifiable by its wide, smooth cap and luminescent pores, is native to a variety of cave biomes. Saucer Fungi enjoy a symbiotic relationship with many species of burrowing creatures.

allItems.Name: Cave Creeper
allItems.Description: A hardy variety of lampenflora. This creeping vine occurs naturally in damp, subterranean environments, but will thrive as a free-standing shrub in any biome type.

allItems.Name: Troglotulip
allItems.Description: This attractive glowing flower is remarkable for its scent, reminiscent of freshly tilled soil. Due to the plant's mineral-rich diet, the stamens often contain traces of cobalt.

allItems.Name: Veined Flat Caps
allItems.Description: Clusters of these large mushrooms can be found growing in underground caves. The surface 'veins' form part of an unusual gill structure, releasing spores from both above and below the fungus's cap.

allItems.Name: Fingery Deposit
allItems.Description: This stalagmite was formed by the dripping of cobalt-rich moisture over several millennia. It is eternally cold to the touch, as though the rock recalls the temperature of its home cave.

allItems.Name: Antimatter Observation Orb
allItems.Description: This spiked chamber contains a globule of antimatter, creating an unusual display piece for discerning base builders.

allItems.Name: Synthesis Core
allItems.Description:
A replica of the mysterious orb utilised by Polo's Quicksilver Synthesis Companion.

The physical properties of the orb are forever shifting in strangely rhythmic patterns: temperature, radioactivity and density all fluctuating to an unheard song.

allItems.Name: Bubble Vat
allItems.Description: A miniaturised replica of the bubbling 'liquid' vat which forms part of the Space Anomaly's anatomy. This mesmerising ornament brings an echo of Polo and Nada's anomalous home to planetary bases.

allItems.Name: Bubble Duct
allItems.Description:
This clear glass aqueduct encloses a perpetually churning supply of 'liquid'.

Intelligently welds into different shapes to create mesmerising displays in your base.

allItems.Name: L-Shaped Bubble Duct
allItems.Description:
This clear glass aqueduct encloses a perpetually churning supply of 'liquid'. This L-shaped configuration allows for curves in duct connections.

Weld together with different duct shapes to create mesmerising displays in your base.

allItems.Name: T-Shaped Bubble Duct
allItems.Description:
This clear glass aqueduct encloses a perpetually churning supply of 'liquid'. This T-shaped configuration allows for creating branches in duct connections.

Weld together with different duct shapes to create mesmerising displays in your base.

allItems.Name: X-Shaped Bubble Duct
allItems.Description:
This clear glass aqueduct encloses a perpetually churning supply of 'liquid'. This X-shaped configuration allows for connecting four ducts in a cruciform arrangement.

Weld together with different duct shapes to create mesmerising displays in your base.

allItems.Name: Settlement Chart
allItems.Description:
A map showing the location of a nearby planetary settlement, acquired from the Space Station Cartographer.

Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

allItems.Name: Alternative Landing Pad
allItems.Description: A stable, reinforced landing pad for starships.

allItems.Name: Canvas Awning
allItems.Description: Draped canvas awning. Can be affixed to structures to provide shade and embellishment.

allItems.Name: Twin Flag Awning
allItems.Description: Draped canvas awning, fashioned into two discrete flags. Can be affixed to structures to provide shade and embellishment.

allItems.Name: Quad Flag Awning
allItems.Description: Draped canvas awning, fashioned into four discrete flags. Can be affixed to structures to provide shade and embellishment.

allItems.Name: Stone Support Pillar
allItems.Description: Stone columns for providing additional support to structural walls.

allItems.Name: Water Tower
allItems.Description: A large, sturdy reservoir for storing and purifying water and other liquids.

allItems.Name: Dish Receptor Antenna
allItems.Description: A versatile antenna, fitted with a dish to collect and focus a range of complex interstellar signals.

allItems.Name: Tall Antenna
allItems.Description: An extra-long antenna, optimised for receiving simple communication signals from interstellar distances.

allItems.Name: Dual-Pronged Antenna
allItems.Description: An dual-pronged antenna, optimised for receiving complex communication signals from interplanetary distances.

allItems.Name: Hanging Flag 1
allItems.Description: An ornamental flag suspended from a horizontal pole, for base decoration.

allItems.Name: Hanging Flag 2
allItems.Description: An ornamental flag suspended from a horizontal pole, for base decoration.

allItems.Name: Kite-Patterned Rug
allItems.Description: An opulent floor covering with a diamond pattern. Woven from a blend of iridescent sandworm silk and dirt-wicking nano-fibres, this ornate rug is both beautiful and durable.

allItems.Name: Kiln-Fired Pot
allItems.Description: A gold-rimmed pot for storing anything from potpourri to GekNip to proto-sausage pie. A ceramic blend of ferrite and clay, this ornament lends a rustic touch to base decor.

allItems.Name: Upholstered Chair
allItems.Description: An elegant moulded chair, upholstered in the softest poly-suede.

allItems.Name: Golden Table
allItems.Description: This elegant hexagonal table features an inbuilt thermal grille, for maintaining the temperature of cooked products, or for warming or cooling aching fingers.

allItems.Name: Wall Light
allItems.Description: A low-energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

allItems.Name: Golden Half Counter
allItems.Description:
This beautiful golden half counter is coated in a thin layer of living glass, ensuring thermal stability and a scratch-free finish. An illuminated base assists visibility in all lighting conditions.

Place alongside Golden Counter and Golden Counter Corner modules to create bespoke counter layouts.

allItems.Name: Golden Counter
allItems.Description:
This beautiful golden counter is coated in a thin layer of living glass, ensuring thermal stability and a scratch-free finish. An illuminated base assists visibility in all lighting conditions.

Place alongside Golden Counter Corner and Golden Half Counter modules to create bespoke counter layouts.

allItems.Name: Golden Counter Corner
allItems.Description:
This beautiful golden counter corner is coated in a thin layer of living glass, ensuring thermal stability and a scratch-free finish. An illuminated base assists visibility in all lighting conditions.

Place alongside Golden Counter and Golden Half Counter modules to create bespoke counter layouts.

allItems.Name: Vintage Teapot
allItems.Description:
A rustic-styled vessel for brewing and serving hot beverages, crafted in the traditional style of the Gek First Spawn.
This decorative tableware lends a touch of comfort and style to bases.

allItems.Name: Table Lamp
allItems.Description: A softly-glowing table lamp with self-powered light tubes. Adjustable for focused nighttime reading or ambient lighting.

allItems.Name: Vintage Tumbler
allItems.Description:
A rustic-styled drinking vessel: forged from a tough copper alloy, blackened with regis grease and laser-sealed.
This decorative tableware lends a touch of comfort and style to bases.

allItems.Name: Vintage Dish
allItems.Description:
A rustic-styled eating vessel: forged from a tough copper alloy, blackened with regis grease and laser-sealed.
This decorative tableware lends a touch of comfort and style to bases.

allItems.Name: Small Box
allItems.Description: A carbon fibre reinforced container, sealed for storing perishables.

allItems.Name: Oil Burner
allItems.Description: A decorative oil burner, self-heated by a concealed reactive core. Transforms any structure into an olfactory delight, filling the air with fragrant bouquets.

allItems.Name: Vintage Cooking Pan
allItems.Description:
A shallow, double-handled pan for preparing food. Advanced fluoropolymer technology creates a non-stick, self-cleaning surface.
This decorative cookware lends a touch of comfort and style to bases.

allItems.Name: Ornate Stool
allItems.Description: A stylish three-legged stool, reinforced to support ten times the weight of an average adult Vy'keen. The polyurethane-nanite seat morphs to accommodate the occupant's body shape, making this simple stool surprisingly comfortable.

allItems.Name: Reinforced Capsule
allItems.Description: A small lead-lined capsule suitable for storing hazardous and radioactive materials.

allItems.Name: Vintage Tap
allItems.Description: A vintage-styled tap, fitted with laser-enhanced filtration technology. Suitable for dispensing all varieties of liquid, from potable beverages to corrosive acids. Not recommended for use with living slime.

allItems.Name: Weathered Hanging
allItems.Description: A heavyweight canvas wall decoration. Suspended from Vy'keen Artillery-grade rope, this base adornment is engineered to endure all weather conditions.

allItems.Name: Mini Weathered Hangings
allItems.Description: A set of four mini canvas wall decorations. Suspended from Vy'keen Artillery-grade rope, this base adornment is engineered to endure all weather conditions.

allItems.Name: Weathered Hanging Triptych
allItems.Description: A set of three mini canvas wall decorations. Suspended from Vy'keen Artillery-grade rope, this base adornment is engineered to endure all weather conditions.

allItems.Name: Stone Trough
allItems.Description: A decorative stone trough.

allItems.Name: Illuminated Sign
allItems.Description: An attention-grabbing welcome sign, illuminated by an array of gas-discharge tubes. Suitable for hanging in commercial premises, or in bases as an eccentric home decoration.

allItems.Name: Stepladder
allItems.Description: A self-supporting ladder, foldable for convenient transportation.

allItems.Name: Scaffolding
allItems.Description: Temporary scaffolding, used to access the upper portions of buildings during construction.

allItems.Name: Large Scaffolding
allItems.Description: Double-width temporary scaffolding, used to access the upper portions of buildings during construction.

allItems.Name: Pail
allItems.Description: A small pail for disposing of scrap materials.

allItems.Name: Tall Bucket
allItems.Description: A tall bucket for disposing of scrap materials.

allItems.Name: Wooden Pallet
allItems.Description: Stackable, robust wooden pallet. Conforms to Universal Construction Standards 3.6a, ensuring compatibility with forklifts developed by all participating alien races.

allItems.Name: Brick Pile
allItems.Description: A pile of bricks and steel beams, unwrapped and ready for construction.

allItems.Name: Cement Bag
allItems.Description: A bag of geopolymer cement for mixing into environmentally-friendly, self-healing concrete.

allItems.Name: Barricade
allItems.Description: Temporary barricade, used cordon off dangerous construction zones.

allItems.Name: H-Beam Stack
allItems.Description: Stacked steel beams, ideal for constructing support trusses in large structures.

allItems.Name: Cement Mixer
allItems.Description: Lightweight machinery for mixing cement into concrete.

allItems.Name: Shovel
allItems.Description: A manual digging implement, still used by some lifeforms for agricultural or construction labour.

allItems.Name: Covered Brick Pile
allItems.Description: A pile of bricks and steel beams, wrapped and ready for transportation.

allItems.Name: Large Tyre
allItems.Description: A heavy-duty tyre with all-terrain tread. Fitted with an auto-stabilisation gyroscope and emergency re-inflation pump.

allItems.Name: Composter
allItems.Description: A living composting system inhabited by a colony of Lumbricus worms. The self-regulating ecosystem processes organic waste and releases nutrients into the local soil.

allItems.Name: Small Furnace
allItems.Description: An metallurgic furnace with an ultra-fast rise time, capable of melting anything from tin to tungsten within minutes.

allItems.Name: Wheelbarrow
allItems.Description: A small wheelbarrow for transporting heavy items. Fitted with a microprocessor, it can be pushed manually, or programmed to autonomously execute simple routines.

allItems.Name: Excavation Claw
allItems.Description: An industrial excavator bucket with self-sharpening chisel teeth, for displacing large quantities of terrain without the use of Multi-Tool technology.

allItems.Name: Wash Trough
allItems.Description: A sturdy trough with drainage, for washing equipment or watering livestock.

allItems.Name: Ventilated Crate
allItems.Description: A small vented crate, ideal for ripening or cooling agricultural produce.

allItems.Name: Insulated Flask
allItems.Description: A sealed vacuum flask ideal for storing launch fuel, liquid nitrogen, or hot beverages.

allItems.Name: Sealed Barrel
allItems.Description: An industrial sealed barrel, for safe containment of all manner of hazardous material.

allItems.Name: Spark Plug
allItems.Description: A spare fuel ignition device, compatible with galactic standard industrial machinery and certain models of starship.

allItems.Name: Drawn Cart
allItems.Description: An unpowered vehicle, with only primitive load-stabilising technology.

allItems.Name: Cart Wheel
allItems.Description: A spare cart wheel.

allItems.Name: Scissor Lift
allItems.Description: This electric propulsion scissor lift provides a safe, self-levelling alternative to traditional scaffolding on construction sites.

allItems.Name: Industrial Pump
allItems.Description: A centrifugal pump for moving liquid, fitted with sensors to detect and auto-evacuate blockages.

allItems.Name: Small Generator
allItems.Description: A portable thermoelectric generator.

allItems.Name: Large Moulded Crate
allItems.Description: A mass-produced, lightweight crate.

allItems.Name: Moulded Crate
allItems.Description: A mass-produced, lightweight crate.

allItems.Name: Holographic Chart Projector
allItems.Description:
A decorative model of a star system, complete with holographic representations of various stellar objects.

A small, self-contained, perpetual motion device generates the small amount of power required to continue the projection.

allItems.Name: Bio-Lantern
allItems.Description:
A secure biological containment vessel, complete with its own purified internal atmosphere.

Pre-installed bioluminescent insects provide a soft, flickering light, perfect for those seeking natural lighting for their base.

allItems.Name: ByteBeat Chip: 'Nemesis101'
allItems.Description:
A data storage lattice containing a single ByteBeat music track.

Track data will be added to the 'Other Tracks' section of the ByteBeat Library. Access the Library from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: ByteBeat Chip: 'Cosine Will Never Forget You'
allItems.Description:
A data storage lattice containing a single ByteBeat music track.

Track data will be added to the 'Other Tracks' section of the ByteBeat Library. Access the Library from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: ByteBeat Chip: 'Sultans of Ping'
allItems.Description:
A data storage lattice containing a single ByteBeat music track.

Track data will be added to the 'Other Tracks' section of the ByteBeat Library. Access the Library from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Pipe
allItems.Description:
Basic structural buildable item.

Weld into curves to create complex pipe networks.

allItems.Name: Large Freighter Room A
allItems.Description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.

Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

allItems.Name: Large Freighter Room B
allItems.Description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.

Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

allItems.Description:
This expansion module allows for the rapid construction of habitable spaces inside large starships.

Construction unit is fabricated complete with pressure bulkhead and all necessary attachment points.

allItems.Name: Square Room
allItems.Description: A square alternative to the core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

allItems.Name: Square Room
allItems.Description: A square alternative to the core module for base construction, providing a generous central space on which to expand.

allItems.Name: Squared Standing Light
allItems.Description: A low-energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

allItems.Name: Rounded Standing Light
allItems.Description: A low-energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

allItems.Name: Capped Standing Light
allItems.Description: A low-energy consumption light, with an extended lifespan and fully recyclable components.

allItems.Name: Base Computer
allItems.Description:
Portable land registration service.

When placed, contacts Universal Cartographic Archive to establish ownership of land. Successful registration allows the construction of base modules across any site of the user's choosing.

allItems.Name: Landing Pad
allItems.Description: A stable, reinforced landing pad for starships.

allItems.Name: Galactic Trade Terminal
allItems.Description: A trading terminal that provides instant local access to the market for resources and commodities.

allItems.Name: Health Station
allItems.Description: A wall mounted module that can be used to recharge health.

allItems.Name: Hazard Protection Unit
allItems.Description:
A wall mounted module that can be used to recharge the user's Hazard Protection systems.

The Hazard Protection Unit must be kept charged with a source of fuel.

allItems.Name: Save Beacon
allItems.Description:
Once activated, beacons provide a permanent navigational waypoint, facilitating repeat visits to specific locations.

Allows user to record their progress at any time.

allItems.Name: Save Point
allItems.Description: A buildable save point for managing your progress.

allItems.Name: Signal Booster
allItems.Description:
A versatile scanner that detects nearby buildings. Can decrypt Navigation Data to pinpoint specific locations.

The Signal Booster can be dismantled and redeployed for easy transportation.

allItems.Name: Antimatter Reactor
allItems.Description:
An autonomous baryogenesis reactor, this device can be left to harvest reality paradoxes and convert them into usable antimatter. User must monitor fuel levels to ensure continued operation.

The resulting antimatter is safely contained, ready for use in all standard hyperspace power units.

allItems.Name: Base Teleport Module
allItems.Description:
A personal teleport device, allowing the user to move quickly between their constructed bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network.

User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.

allItems.Name: Fleet Command Room
allItems.Description:
Core Fleet Management Station. This advanced holographic communications station is vital for managing fleet expeditions from the comfort of your capital ship.

User is advised that multiple stations are required to manage more than one expedition at a time.

allItems.Name: Construction Research Unit
allItems.Description:
Portable blueprint research device.

This field-deployable research module allows the user to convert old or damaged technology modules into advanced construction blueprints.

allItems.Name: Portable Refiner
allItems.Description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.

The Portable Refiner can be dismantled and redeployed for easy transportation. Note: the Portable Refiner requires fuel to operate.

allItems.Name: Medium Refiner
allItems.Description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.

The Medium Refiner allows two different substances to be combined into one new material, or materials to be processed at better ratios. 

The Medium Refiner must be installed in a Habitable Base, but does not require additional power sources.

allItems.Name: Large Refiner
allItems.Description:
A vital piece of planetary equipment. The Refiner allows gathered substances to be processed into more powerful and more advanced materials.

The Large Refiner allows three different substances to be combined into one new material, or materials to be processed at better ratios. 

The Large Refiner must be installed in a Habitable Base, but does not require additional power sources.

allItems.Name: Appearance Modifier
allItems.Description:
A buildable module that allows the users to adjust their personal appearance settings.

The module applies advanced holographic techniques to recalibrate the light around the user, allowing them to adopt whatever appearance they desire. Visual data must be properly formated before use.

allItems.Name: Nutrient Processor
allItems.Description:
A portable nutrient extractor, able to process and refine gathered ingredients into edible food products.

User is advised that consumption of generated products is entirely at their own risk.

allItems.Name: Automated Feeder
allItems.Description:
A robotic farming unit, designed to automatically supply nearby creatures with food.

When powered, will attract nearby animal life. Keep bait tanks full in order to supply lifeforms with desired food.

allItems.Name: Livestock Unit
allItems.Description:
A robotic farming unit, designed to automatically harvest substances from creatures. Requires power.

Creatures that are ready to be harvested for milk, eggs or other specialist produce will approach the Livestock Unit and deposit their yields. The creatures are unharmed by the process.

Will harvest produce from creatures fed by hand or via an Automated Feeder.

allItems.Name: Message Module
allItems.Description: A small and accessible information container for leaving messages or viewing left messages and short strings of information.

allItems.Name: Communications Station
allItems.Description: A terminal for the composition and transmission of messages to other travellers.

allItems.Name: Nomad Geobay
allItems.Description: An underground secure parking facility for the Nomad light Exocraft.

allItems.Name: Roamer Geobay
allItems.Description: An underground secure parking facility for the Roamer medium Exocraft.

allItems.Name: Colossus Geobay
allItems.Description: An underground secure parking facility for the Colossus large Exocraft.

allItems.Name: Pilgrim Geobay
allItems.Description: An underground secure parking facility for the Pilgrim light Exocraft.

allItems.Name: Nautilon Chamber
allItems.Description: An advanced, fully-airlocked docking station for the Nautilon submarine.

allItems.Name: Exocraft Summoning Station
allItems.Description:
Construction allows the user to summon any owned Exocraft from anywhere else on that planet.

Interfaces with the Exosuit Quick Command Menu to ease of use.

allItems.Name: Construction Terminal
allItems.Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Construction Overseers, and equipped with architectural and engineering design software.

allItems.Name: Exocraft Terminal
allItems.Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Mechanics, and equipped with bespoke vehicular design software.

allItems.Name: Weapons Terminal
allItems.Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Armourers, and equipped for the development of munitions and explosives as well as selected civilian tech.

allItems.Name: Science Terminal
allItems.Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Scientists, and equipped for research and development of scientific blueprints.

allItems.Name: Agricultural Terminal
allItems.Description: A research station tailored to the needs of Farmers, and equipped for the analysis and cultivation of farmable crops.

allItems.Name: Hydroponic Tray
allItems.Description:
A self contained growth system for the indoor cultivation of agricultural crops.

Build requirement: Must be placed indoors.

allItems.Name: Large Hydroponic Tray
allItems.Description:
A self contained growth system for the indoor cultivation of agricultural crops. Can support up to four plants.

Build requirement: Must be placed indoors.

allItems.Name: Base Teleport Module
allItems.Description:
A personal teleport device, allowing the user to move quickly between their constructed bases, as well as any Space Station Terminuses connected to their network.

User is urged to verify network integrity before inserting any matter they cannot afford to become separated from.

allItems.Name: Race Force Amplifier
allItems.Description: Provides a boost to your Exocraft during races.

allItems.Name: Race Obstacle
allItems.Description: Provides extra challenge for Exocraft races.

allItems.Name: Race Initiator
allItems.Description: This platform acts as the start and finish line for Exocraft field tests, allowing Travellers to practice manoeuvring and speed.

allItems.Name: Marine Shelter
allItems.Description:
An emergency survival module.

Can be rapidly deployed on the seabed in the event of an oxygen or other Exosuit life support emergency. Provides temporary shelter from environmental hazards, predators and other hostiles forces found in the deep ocean.

allItems.Name: Sphere Creator
allItems.Description:
A highly-specific fabrication device, developed with the intention of finding the universe's most perfect sphere.

Requires power to operate. Will create a large sphere, ready for whatever experiments are deemed necessary.

allItems.Name: Noise Box
allItems.Description:
A special construction module designed to emit a high-frequency noise. Pitch may be adjusted to the user's requirements.

Requires power to operate.

allItems.Name: Oxygen Harvester
allItems.Description:
An autonomous atmosphere extractor, this device can be left to collect and purify oxygen from the air. User must monitor fuel levels to ensure continued operation.

The resulting gas is compressed and processed, ready for use in all standard life support systems.

allItems.Name: Autonomous Mining Unit
allItems.Description: An automated harvester for the mining of resources. Once activated, the AMU extracts minerals without the need for supervision, providing a regular yield until the site is exhausted.

allItems.Name: Mineral Extractor
allItems.Description:
An automated mineral harvester. Determine a site with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Mineral extraction rates and produced minerals will vary from site to site.

Requires power to function. Connect to Silos with Pipelines to allow collection from more convenient sites.

allItems.Name: Gas Extractor
allItems.Description:
An automated gas harvester. Determine a site with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Gas extraction rates and produced gases will vary from site to site.

Requires power to function. Connect to Silos with Pipelines to allow collection from more convenient sites.

allItems.Name: Supply Depot
allItems.Description:
Automated storage unit. Connect to a Supply Grid using Pipelines.

Automatically stores the output of various Mineral and Gas Extractors, allowing for increased capacity and more efficient siting. Can be located a long distances from the extraction site.

allItems.Name: Supply Pipe
allItems.Description:
Flexible, high-strength piping. Able to withstand a highly-pressurised internal environment.

Used for connecting various Mineral and Gas Extractors to Silos

allItems.Name: Solar Panel
allItems.Description:
An efficient power generator, this solar array will turn sunlight into the electrical energy required to power many base structures.

Generates no power at night. Partner with Batteries to store energy for the hours of darkness.

allItems.Name: Electromagnetic Generator
allItems.Description:
When suitably placed in an area of high field strength, efficient electromagnetic dynamos are used to generate near limitless power.

Locate appropriate sites with the Surveying upgrade for the Analysis Visor. Power output will vary from site to site.

allItems.Name: Biofuel Reactor
allItems.Description:
A small power generator. Burns carbon-based fuel placed in its furnace tank and converts it into usable power.

Connect power generators to base structures and technologies with electrical wiring. Many parts require power to function.

allItems.Name: Electrical Wiring
allItems.Description:
High-capacity electrical wiring. Use wiring to connect Power Generators to your base. Most technology, as well as structures with embedded lighting systems, require a power source to operate.

Wiring can be connected to various switches to facilitate selective power flow.

allItems.Name: Teleport Cable
allItems.Description: Advanced fibre-optic cabling, designed to link one or more Short-Range Teleporters.

allItems.Name: Wall Switch
allItems.Description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when pulled.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

allItems.Name: Floor Switch
allItems.Description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when stood upon or otherwise activated.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

allItems.Name: Battery
allItems.Description:
Highly-efficient energy storage units. Connect to a power grid, and onboard power management circuits will automatically draw down spare capacity to charge its cells.

When the grid attempts to draw more power than is currently supplied, the battery will automatically deploy power to make up the shortfall.

allItems.Name: Proximity Switch
allItems.Description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when an entity is detected nearby.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

allItems.Name: Button
allItems.Description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when used.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

allItems.Name: Power Inverter
allItems.Description:
A power management device, the switch will toggle the flow of power when used.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

allItems.Name: Auto Switch
allItems.Description:
A power management device, this switch will toggle the flow of power when signaled by an incoming signal.

Switches require both power and signal wires to control a device.

allItems.Name: Short-Range Teleporter
allItems.Description:
A low-powered teleporter, construction for instantaneous travel across short distances.

When wired to both a power source and another short-range teleporter, allows near-instant travel between nearby locations.

allItems.Name: Minotaur Geobay
allItems.Description:
An secure parking, summoning and customisation facility for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

Deploy the Minotaur from the Quick Menu. With the aid of an Orbital Exocraft Materialiser mounted inside a freighter, the Minotaur can be instantly deployed to any location within the same system as the mothership.

allItems.Name: Multi-Tool Expansion Slot
allItems.Description:
A flexible upgrade circuit, compatible with all person Multi-Tools.

This module can be wired into a Multi-Tool at a Space Station Multi-Tool Upgrade Rack, granting the user more space in the Multi-Tool's internal layout to add further upgrades or technology specialisations.

Compatible with all standard life-support fittings.

allItems.Name: Enzyme Fluid
allItems.Description:
A specialist bait for herbivores. Use the Analysis Visor to discover the bait preferences of specific creatures.

Created in a Nutrient Processor from Faecium and harvestable plants.

Can be further processed in the Nutrient Processor to create new bait types.

Feeding using the correct bait will allow creatures to be ridden or harvested. Chose bait type from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

Created in a Nutrient Processor from Faecium and other bait types.

Feeding using the correct bait will allow creatures to be ridden or harvested. Chose bait type from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Creature Pellets
allItems.Description:
Basic creature bait. Can be placed directly or accessed via the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

This bait will attract creatures and cause them to yield Faecium. Once a creature has been fed, they may be tamed or farmed for their produce.

Dropping bait may calm angry creatures.

allItems.Name: Synthetic Worms
allItems.Description:
A specialist bait for carnivores. Use the Analysis Visor to discover the bait preferences of specific creatures.

Created in a Nutrient Processor from Mordite and assorted creature flesh.

Feeding using the correct bait will allow creatures to be ridden or harvested. It will also calm predators. Chose bait type from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Salty Juice
allItems.Description:
A consumable liquid, created in the Nutrient Processor. Prized across the galaxy for its pleasing mouth-feel and authentically natural flavours.

Can be ingested as it stands or subjected to further processing.

allItems.Name: Icey Marrow
allItems.Description:

Food such as this can be highly valuable.
