allItems.Name: Bone Cream
allItems.Description:
A refined food product, created in the Nutrient Processor. Food such as this can be highly valuable. It has both the identifying shapes and aromas of an actual food item, in stark contrast with conventional nutrition paste or pellets.

Can be consumed as it stands or subjected to further processing.

allItems.Name: Quad Servo
allItems.Description: A highly sprung motor arm salvaged from inside of a Sentinel patrol unit. It occasionally twitches, as if experiencing the echo of combat.

allItems.Name: Walker Brain
allItems.Description:
Shifting nanite clusters sewn together with a pugneum filament, this circuit is painfully hot to the touch.

A sinister purple light leaks from deep within its wiring, changing in intensity as it watches its holder.

allItems.Name: Mind Arc
allItems.Description: A strange piece of technology, a gift from beyond the stars. It shimmers in a way that suggests it is not fully in this world.

allItems.Name: Captured Nanode
allItems.Description: Atlas Seed containing zonally-shifted quasi-stellar substrate. Warning: do not allow matrix to commune with this dimensional space.

allItems.Name: Englobed Shade
allItems.Description: This Atlas Shell holds the remains of a parasitic space-borne lifeform, most likely of extra-dimensional origins.

allItems.Name: Noospheric Orb
allItems.Description: An Atlas Seed capable of resonating on humanoid telepathic frequencies; may attempt to subsume any subordinate intellect in close proximity.

allItems.Name: Dark Matter
allItems.Description: An Atlas Seed shell encompassing a void element harvested from the collapse state of the last universe. Toxic if ingested.

allItems.Name: Dawn's End
allItems.Description: Sculpted tau neutrino-boson matrix fixed within an irreplaceable Atlas Seed shell. May be semi-sentient.

allItems.Name: Photic Jade
allItems.Description: This irreplaceable Atlas Seed is a form of matter-adapted photons coalesced into physical solidity by unknown means.

allItems.Name: State Phasure
allItems.Description: For unknown reasons, this unique Atlas Seed has been phased out of alignment with this quantum reality. Contents cannot be determined.

allItems.Name: Novae Reclaiment
allItems.Description: Atlas Seed contains neutronium elements from a catastrophic supernova event that obliterated a sentient civilization in an earlier era.

allItems.Name: Modified Quanta
allItems.Description: This one-of-a-kind Atlas Seed holds an aesthetically pleasing mathematical construct salvaged from the simulation of an alternate reality.

allItems.Name: Heart of the Sun
allItems.Description: An Atlas Seed containing a time-locked quantum cilia suspended in a photonic shell. No others are known to exist.

allItems.Name: NipNip Buds
allItems.Description: A pungent bud harvested from the NipNip plant, often used to produce Gek Nip.

allItems.Name: Larval Core
allItems.Description: A pulsating jellied orb, this gooey sphere is warm to the touch. Its stench triggers a primal fear in mortal beings, a deep-seated gnawing that begs you to drop it and flee.

allItems.Name: Salvaged Data
allItems.Description:
The salvageable heart of some ancient technology. Unreadable in its current form.

These databanks can be spent at a Construction Research Unit and used to research new Construction Blueprints.

allItems.Name: Living Pearl
allItems.Description:
Born in the hearts of enormous glowing molluscs found deep underwater.

Unlike most pearls, this sample is no unliving calcite. Some trace of the mother-clam's consciousness remains within the gem, giving it a lingering, haunting beauty.

allItems.Name: Hypnotic Eye
allItems.Description:
The eye is cold, almost frozen, to the touch. Nonetheless, it is impossible to escape the feeling it is somehow still alive.

Extended exposure is not recommended. Do not stare back into the eye. Do not stare back. Do not stare back.

allItems.Name: Hadal Core
allItems.Description:
A highly-pressurised fleshy orb.

One can feel it push back when touched, a flash of bioluminescence stirring in the inky black core of this mysterious object.

allItems.Name: Soul Engine
allItems.Description:
A powerful organic computing unit.

A glitching beat drives this miracle circuit, performing cycle after cycle in an endless, furious loop of calculation.

allItems.Name: Storm Crystal
allItems.Description: A rare and highly valuable cluster of storm crystals. These crystalline structures thrive in stormy conditions, and naturally attract lightning strikes, becoming spectacularly luminescent when ionised. Exclusively found on extreme weather planets.

allItems.Name: Albumen Pearl
allItems.Description:
Gemstone formed over the course of centuries within the egg of a super-incubatory species. Highly ornamental, these gems are themselves living seeds, lucent grains of potential life.

Can be sold at a Galactic Trade Terminal.

allItems.Name: Gravitino Ball
allItems.Description:
A supersymmetric particle cluster created by divergent super-gravitational forces. A micro-rift is created as they form, and extraction of the orb prompts a localised reality weakening. Sentinel forces will respond to stablise any such anomaly.

Can be sold at a Galactic Trade Terminal.

allItems.Name: Sac Venom
allItems.Description:
A stabilised poison gland extracted from a terrestrial urchin. The host-urchin is actually a colony of smaller proto-creatures, a formation built on years of slow growth and cooperation.

Of use both medicinally and as a delicacy in some riskier cuisines.

Can be sold at a Galactic Trade Terminal.

allItems.Name: Vortex Cube
allItems.Description:
An ancient object, unearthed from the depths of a planetary cave system. Its surface is cold to the touch, and is curiously polished despite its age.

A fusion of metal and rock, these cubes have proved resistant to industrial processing. As such, they are of value only to collectors.

Can be sold at a Galactic Trade Terminal.

allItems.Name: Atlas Stone
allItems.Description:
A spherical gem that seems to pulsate with red light from its centre.
 
An extremely rare item often associated with ancient monolithic sites.

allItems.Name: Hex Core
allItems.Description: This strange energy orb constantly vibrates, emitting a low-frequency drone. Slight variations in the pattern repeat over and over, almost as if it is attempting to relay a message.

allItems.Name: Geode
allItems.Description:
An unusually vibrant and potentially valuable lump of rock.

Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and crack open with FE_ALT1.

allItems.Name: Crystal Fragment
allItems.Description:
A crystalline shard with an unusually dense structure. Potentially highly valuable.

Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and crack open with FE_ALT1.

allItems.Name: Tritium Hypercluster
allItems.Description:
A shard of pure crystalised Tritium.

Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and crack open with FE_ALT1.

allItems.Name: Gold Nugget
allItems.Description:
A highly valuable ore chunk, ready to be processed into Gold.

Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and crack open with FE_ALT1.

allItems.Name: Crystal Sulphide
allItems.Description:
Formed in the incredible, high-pressure furnace of planetary cores, these rich mineral deposits have an almost glass-like quality.

Has a wide variety of industrial uses, taking advantage of both its mineral content and its extreme strength under pressure.

allItems.Name: Vy'keen Tablet
allItems.Description:
A stone tablet bearing line after line of intricate runes. The words are unintelligible, an ancient dialect forgotten by all but the oldest of the Vy'keen elders.

The hand that carved this stone must have been extraordinary. The stonework is precise, delicate - and yet perfectly conveys the unyielding aggression its writer clearly possessed.

allItems.Name: Divergence Cube
allItems.Description:
A glitching, pulsing data unit. It does not seem to belong in this reality.

The cube gives the impression of a silent scream, the frozen cries of hundreds of lost minds trapped within.

allItems.Name: Gek Relic
allItems.Description:
A metal statuette of a creature with a coin placed in its beak.
 
Popular with many traders who see it as an emblem of fair commerce and peace.

allItems.Name: GekNip
allItems.Description:
Edible product much beloved by the Gek.
 
Allows beaked traders to release delightfully scented packets of gas for a prolonged period of time.
 
GekNip gas packets are considered an art form, and the truest representation of the Gek soul.

allItems.Name: Vy'keen Effigy
allItems.Description:
A small wooden icon carved into the shape of a Sentinel drone.
 
Used by warriors to enter a temporary trance-like state that eliminates their kind's need for sleep.

allItems.Name: Vy'keen Dagger
allItems.Description: Largely ceremonial weapon. A vital part of Vy'keen tradition and culture.

allItems.Name: Korvax Casing
allItems.Description:
The metallic shell of a disconnected electronic lifeform that was too distant from its kind to be refreshed with a new entity.
 
Highly prized by all species, not least its own.

allItems.Name: Korvax Convergence Cube
allItems.Description: Device used by the Korvax for the storage of historical and cultural information.

allItems.Name: AtlasPass v1
allItems.Description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.

Provides access to low level restricted areas and outpost systems.

allItems.Name: AtlasPass v2
allItems.Description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.
 
Provides access to mid-tier restricted areas and outpost systems.

allItems.Name: AtlasPass v3
allItems.Description:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.
 
Provides access to high level restricted areas and outpost systems.

allItems.Name: Factory Override Unit
allItems.Description:
A portable data unit, compatible with most planetary fabricator facilities.

Once access has been gained to a central control terminal, the Override Unit can divert the facilities resources towards researching new product recipes.

allItems.Name: Salvaged Frigate Module
allItems.Description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of a large interstellar starship. May be collected from freighter crashsites or salvaged during frigate expeditions.

Useless in its current form, a Research Station aboard your freighter may be able to convert it into useable technology.

allItems.Name: Void Egg
allItems.Description:
An anomalous egg. The shell is tough and leathery, and twitches when touched.

A faint tapping can be heard coming from within. From time to time, it appears to sing.

allItems.Name: Active Void Egg
allItems.Description:
An anomalous egg. Since the encounter with the bizarre deep-space 'creature', its strange music has grown more active, more agitated.

When touched, conjures a powerful vision of a world beset by powerful anomalies and strange colours.

allItems.Name: Stirring Void Egg
allItems.Description:
An anomalous egg. Since the encounter with the bizarre deep-space 'creature', its strange music has grown more active, more agitated.

When touched, conjures a powerful vision of a dust-covered world of extreme storms.

allItems.Name: Awakened Void Egg
allItems.Description:
An anomalous egg. Since the encounter with the bizarre deep-space 'creature', its strange music has grown more active, more agitated.

When touched, conjures a powerful vision of a water world covered in lush and verdant plantlife.

allItems.Name: Cracking Void Egg
allItems.Description:
An anomalous egg. Since the encounter with the bizarre deep-space 'creature', its strange music has grown more active, more agitated.

When touched, conjures a powerful visions of a planet of strange anomalies, one minute a world of grass, the next a world of bizarre fungal growths...

allItems.Name: Anomaly Detector
allItems.Description:
A single-use geometric beacon that probes the surrounding area for near-space anomalies. Such objects are highly unpredictable.

Select the Detector and use Begin Scan (FE_ALT1) to begin the location process.

allItems.Name: Emergency Broadcast Receiver
allItems.Description:
A single-use receiver that scans for distress signals on freighter frequencies. Derelict or abandoned freighters often contain high-value salvage.

Select the Receiver and use Tune Signal (FE_ALT1) to begin the location process.

allItems.Name: Emergency Broadcast Receiver (Active)
allItems.Description:
A single-use receiver that scans for distress signals on freighter frequencies. Derelict or abandoned freighters often contain high-value salvage.

Select the Receiver and use Tune Signal (FE_ALT1) to begin the location process.

allItems.Name: Cargo Bulkhead
allItems.Description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of an abandoned freighter found floating in space. May also be salvaged during frigate expeditions.

Pre-packed nano-expanders fill out this portable unit and graft it to an existing freighter, increasing its inventory capacity. Apply at your freighter's Upgrade Terminal.

allItems.Name: Encrypted Navigation Computer
allItems.Description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship navigation, flight stabilisation, and external sensors.

This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

allItems.Name: Encrypted Navigation Computer
allItems.Description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship navigation, flight stabilisation, and external sensors.

This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

allItems.Name: Navigation Computer
allItems.Description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship navigation, flight stabilisation, and external sensors.

The part appears intact, functional, and ready to be installed in a new ship.

allItems.Name: Encrypted Communicator Control Unit
allItems.Description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to ship-to-ship communications, quantum transportation, and coordinate tracing.

This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

allItems.Name: Encrypted Communicator Control Unit
allItems.Description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to ship-to-ship communications, quantum transportation, and coordinate tracing.

This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

allItems.Name: Communicator Control Unit
allItems.Description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to ship-to-ship communications, quantum transportation, and coordinate tracing.

The part appears intact, functional, and ready to be installed in a new ship.

allItems.Name: Encrypted User Authenticator
allItems.Description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship-to-Exosuit synchronisation and security.

This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

allItems.Name: Encrypted User Authenticator
allItems.Description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship-to-Exosuit synchronisation and security.

This part could be in working order, but will require decryption before it can be installed in a new ship. A paired decryption terminal can be located via Exosuit analysis.

allItems.Name: User Authenticator
allItems.Description:
An advanced nanocomputer, performing processing tasks related to starship-to-Exosuit synchronisation and security.

The part appears intact, functional, and ready to be installed in a new ship.

allItems.Name: Freighter Recolouring
allItems.Description:
Unlocks this colour for freighter customisation.

A self-replicating cloud of highly pigmatised nano-robots swarm the capital ship, changing its external appearance.

allItems.Name: Station Override
allItems.Description:
A portable data drive containing the AI override codes for a Space Station Core.

The importance of the station AI core ensures that such keys are both highly regulated and extremely profitable on the black market.

allItems.Name: Planetary Chart
allItems.Description:
A map of a nearby planet. The coordinates of a distress signal have been marked.

Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

allItems.Name: Planetary Chart
allItems.Description:
A map of a nearby location, retrieved from the Local Information Repository at a Planetary Archive building.

An ancient ruined site has been marked. Excavating this site is likely to yield valuable treasures.

Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

allItems.Name: Ancient Key
allItems.Description: A key of some weight, this aged piece of wrought iron must belong in a nearby lock...

allItems.Name: Trident Key
allItems.Description:
A strange forked key, glowing with an ultraviolet light.

Despite its primitive appearance, Exosuit scanning systems reveal traces of nanite foam upon its teeth.

allItems.Name: Navigation Data
allItems.Description:
Encoded navigation data. This highly portable data unit contains all relevant cartographical information for a planetary region.

May be traded with a Cartographer aboard a Space Station in exchange for usable star charts.

allItems.Name: Drop Pod Coordinate Data
allItems.Description:
Encoded navigation data for input into a Signal Booster.

When properly decrypted, will reveal the location of a Drop Pod containing Exosuit Upgrades.

allItems.Name: Log Encryption Key
allItems.Description:
A fragment of the encryption override sequence for a freighter's emergency log.

Several parts of the sequence may be required to gain full access to recorded data.

allItems.Name: Defence Chit
allItems.Description: A token, entitling the bearer to support from the system authorities in dealing with pirate attacks.

allItems.Name: Mind Blown
allItems.Description:
An exclusive gesture.
This can be selected from the Quick Menu to share moments of existential wonder and delight with other explorers.

allItems.Name: Celebrate!
allItems.Description:
An exclusive gesture.
This can be selected from the Quick Menu to share moments of celebration with other explorers.

allItems.Name: Ha!
allItems.Description:
An exclusive gesture.
This can be selected from the Quick Menu to share moments of amusement with other explorers.

allItems.Name: Wonder
allItems.Description:
An exclusive gesture.
This can be selected from the Quick Menu. Gaze up to large structures, fauna, flora, or the stars themselves, and marvel at the insignificance of one small life in all the universe.

allItems.Name: No Problem
allItems.Description:
An exclusive gesture.
This can be selected from the Quick Menu while underwater to signal 'no problem' to other aquatic explorers.

allItems.Name: Distant Gaze
allItems.Description:
An exclusive gesture.
This can be selected from the Quick Menu. Look to the horizon and search for your next adventure.

allItems.Name: Heroic Pose
allItems.Description:
An exclusive gesture.
This can be selected from the Quick Menu. Strike a dramatic pose in front of abandoned structures, towering mineral formations, and colossal predatory lifeforms.

allItems.Name: Disbelief
allItems.Description:
An exclusive gesture.
This can be selected from the Quick Menu. Fall to your knees in disbelief at the wonders you have seen.

allItems.Name: Sparse Horizon Helmet
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Blazing Orbit Helmet
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Eye of the Korvax Helmet
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: First Spawn Battle Mask
allItems.Description:
An aggressive Exosuit Appearance Override, modeled on the war helmets of the ancient Gek.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Armoured Shoulderpads
allItems.Description: Powerful shoulder armour, this Exosuit augmentation comes with high-voltage connections into the user's skeletal system. This current jolts the user's body as required, manipulating the muscles into their optimal defensive posture.

allItems.Name: Armoured Chestpiece
allItems.Description: Reinforced yet stylish, this Exosuit chest armour provides excellent abdominal protection without compromising on looks.

allItems.Name: Armoured ExoGloves
allItems.Description: Armoured gloves, perfect for wielding weapons, impressing martial cultures, and picking really spiky plants.

allItems.Name: Armoured Leggings
allItems.Description:
Carefully woven nano-fibres make these leggings both flexible and resistant to small-arms fire.

Washing requires specialist equipment.

allItems.Name: Armoured Boots
allItems.Description:
Reinforced foot protection system with integrated tread-balancing gyroscopes.

Hundreds of years of high-tech research, as applied to footwear.

allItems.Name: Iteration: Ariadne Visage
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

This part silicone, part biological helmet can detect and replicate the facial muscle movements of the wearer, creating the appearance of a natural head. It is fully compatible with exosuit technology and provides all protection of a traditional helmet.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Storage Augmentation
allItems.Description:
A technology module harvested from the remains of a salvaged starship. May also be collected from freighter crash sites or salvaged during frigate expeditions.

Can be used to expand starship storage capacity at the Space Station's Starship Outfitter.

allItems.Name: Thermal Panels
allItems.Description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.

Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

allItems.Name: Tank of Coolant
allItems.Description:
A valuable piece of broken down starship, created by a Starship Outfitting Terminal at a Space Station.

Component is useful only as scrap to be sold at a Trade Terminal.

allItems.Name: Apollo Figurine
allItems.Description:
A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of the Traveller Apollo.

Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

allItems.Name: Artemis Figurine
allItems.Description:

Install to an Inventory Slot to decorate your ship's interior.

allItems.Name: Atlas Figurine

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, for those who brave the dark places of the universe.

allItems.Name: Horrific Flesh-Helmet
allItems.Description:
Naturally transform your appearance via the application of a flesh-hungry parasite. This living being partially fuses with the brainstem of its host, sealing their symbiosis.

Cautiously transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Wriggling Companion
allItems.Description:
The captured essence of an abyssal horror, contained for scientific and decorative use.

The bounding forcefield is of the very highest quality. The companion cannot escape. The companion will not escape. Escape.

allItems.Name: Flarecap Toadstool
allItems.Description:
This species of fungus is notable for its dense capillary network and bioluminescent qualities. A circulating chain of chemical reactions produces the toadstool's nocturnal glow.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Wizened Stump
allItems.Description:
This ancient stump was harvested from a clonal tree colony, estimated to have lived for over a hundred millennia. Its bark releases a pleasant mossy fragrance.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Mud Hut
allItems.Description:
This simple mud hut was modelled after a mysterious structure discovered in the mists of planet Saxm A13. Similar structures have been found throughout the universe, with no proven hypothesis regarding their origin.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Chitinous Cage
allItems.Description:
A proteinous formation of unknown origin, replicated aboard the Space Anomaly. Its skeletal structure often retains pockets of air, leading to slightly warmer or cooler temperatures in the centre of the cage.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Protea Wheel
allItems.Description:
This unusual lifeform, dominated by a wheel of photophore glands, is difficult to classify neatly into flora or fauna. The thick columns of thorns help protect the flavoursome glands from predators.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Vigilant Taro
allItems.Description:
The eye-like protrusions on this bizarre organism are capable of both processing light and performing simple calculations, although it is unclear what they are watching for...

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Void Husk
allItems.Description:
This eggshell still whispers a faint song, as though connected to a distant chorus...

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Plate Stem
allItems.Description:
The broad, plate-like leaf topping this tree is highly efficient for photosynthesis, and wild specimens can grow to extraordinary heights. This domestic variety is cultivated to be suitable to furnish habitations.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Compound Bulb
allItems.Description:
This vegetative structure is high in antioxidants, though a thick layer of scales makes it impractical for farming.

Provides decorative landscaping opportunities for bases.

allItems.Name: Alliance of Galactic Travellers Banner
allItems.Description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in support of nomadic and exploratory space travel.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Amino Hub Banner
allItems.Description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in support of community, adventure and discovery.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Caf 42 Banner
allItems.Description:
Welcome to the Caf! Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in the spirit of friends, fun and good vibes.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: United Federation of Travelers Banner
allItems.Description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in support of a united universe. Document, aid, create, communicate.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Companion Egg
allItems.Description:
A living, fertile egg, %READY%%EXTRA%

%MODIFIED%

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be %SIZE% and %TRAIT%.

allItems.Name: Alliance of Galactic Travellers Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal represents the Alliance of Galactic Travellers, and the value of nomadic exploration.

allItems.Name: Amino Hub Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal represents the Amino Hub, and the principles of community, adventure and discovery.

allItems.Name: Caf 42 Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal represents Caf 42, and the spirit of friends, fun and good vibes. Welcome to the Caf!

allItems.Name: United Federation of Travelers Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal represents the United Federation of Travelers. Document, aid, create, communicate.

allItems.Name: Qitanian Empire Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal represents the Qitanian Empire, and the spirit of charity, kindness, peace and reason.

allItems.Name: Triple Burst Firework
allItems.Description:
A luxury firework, featuring a triple-burst symphony of colour. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Dual Chrome Firework
allItems.Description:
A luxury firework, exploding into sparkling wedges of indium and cadmium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Wheel of Hirk Firework
allItems.Description:
A luxury firework. When activated, this pyrotechnic marvel turns and whorls in a mesmerising spiral. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Qitanian Empire Banner
allItems.Description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in the spirit of charity, kindness, peace and reason.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Title: 'Exotic'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, 'Exotic', proudly declaring one's status as an outlier.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Title: 'Volcanic'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, 'Volcanic', declaring one's taste for fiery explosions both literal and metaphorical.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Title: 'Swamp-Dweller'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, 'Swamp-Dweller', for those who find joy in places others do not.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Title: 'Sixteenth'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, 'Sixteenth',  for those who know the deepest secrets of the universe.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Title: 'Encoded'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title that will represent your understanding of those who have come before you.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Title: 'Photographer'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, 'Photographer', for those Travellers committed to beautifully documenting their trips through the universe.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Rounded Laser
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Companion Appearance Enhancement. This articulated mining laser is insulated with a lightweight gel, ensuring ultimate comfort for companions assisting with resource harvesting.

Earn the trust of wild animals to adopt companions. Interact with companions to customise their appearance.

allItems.Name: Movement Tracker
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Companion Appearance Enhancement. This compact device generates detailed analytics reports of creature traversal habits, to provide explorers with insight into the secret lives of their animal companions.

Earn the trust of wild animals to adopt companions. Interact with companions to customise their appearance.

allItems.Name: Energy Coil
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Companion Appearance Enhancement. This dual-purpose laser responds to the biological vitals of its wearer, providing an adaptive level of warmth and light, as well as soft pulses to soothe anxiety.

Earn the trust of wild animals to adopt companions. Interact with companions to customise their appearance.

allItems.Name: Exosuit Expansion Unit
allItems.Description:
An advanced survival technology module that allows expansion of a user's Exosuit Storage.

Pre-packed nano-expanders create stablised sub-warp voids within the Exosuit, increasing its inventory capacity. Apply this augmentation at the Exosuit upgrade terminal on board a Space Station.

allItems.Name: Streamlined Jetpack Unit
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

A streamlined and lightweight backpack unit, featuring an elegant single-thruster design. This exclusive exosuit augmentation commemorates completion of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Golden First Spawn Battle Mask
allItems.Description:
An aggressive Exosuit Appearance Override, modeled on the war helmets of the ancient Gek. This special edition is cast in a durable and precious alloy.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Golden Vector
allItems.Description:
An exclusive golden edition of the iconic Alpha Vector Starship, commemorating completion of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.

This highly-manoeuvrable spacecraft is constructed from a durable and precious alloy, and coated in a tough layer of fibrous insulation to endure many lifetimes' worth of rigorous space exploration.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Title: 'Pioneer'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Pioneers Expedition Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal features the golden edition of the iconic Alpha Vector Starship, and commemorates completion of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.

allItems.Name: Pioneers Expedition Banner
allItems.Description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Atlas Firework Pack
allItems.Description:
A three-variety pack of luxury fireworks. These stunning pyrotechnics render the likeness of an Atlas Interface, in bursts of indium, gold and cadmium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Blue-Red Atlas Firework
allItems.Description:
A stunning pyrotechnic rendition of an Atlas Interface, rendered in a burst of indium and cadmium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Gold-Blue Atlas Firework
allItems.Description:
A stunning pyrotechnic rendition of an Atlas Interface, rendered in a burst of gold and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Red-Gold Atlas Firework
allItems.Description:
A stunning pyrotechnic rendition of an Atlas Interface, rendered in a burst of cadmium and gold. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Pioneers Expedition Flag
allItems.Description:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.
This elaborate, gold-fringed flag features a rendition of the iconic Alpha Vector Starship. Plant in a habitable base to commemorate completion of the inaugural Expedition, 'Pioneers'.

allItems.Name: Eokai's Prime Inquirer
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship, pre-fitted with an upgraded Hyperdrive for efficient galactic exploration.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Hoshis HP7
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship, pre-fitted with an upgraded Infra-Knife for efficient destruction of hostile ships.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Nemesis of the Kudama
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship, pre-fitted with an upgraded Positron Ejector for efficient destruction of hostile ships.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Ultimate Pride JB2
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship with a spacious cargo hold, and pre-fitted with upgraded Deflector Shields and a Cyclotron Ballista.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Prime Song JZ4
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship, pre-fitted with a powerful Phase Beam and upgraded Pulse Engine for efficient space exploration. The Economy Scanner also allows for remote access to detailed economic data about a system, assisting in planning galactic trade routes.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Quantum Harmoniser Mark IV
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Multi-Tool. This rifle comes with the lethal Blaze Javelin and recoil-stabilising Combat Scope pre-installed.

Take this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Loop Scoop Mark IV
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Multi-Tool. This pistol comes with the offensive Boltcaster and defensive Personal Forcefield pre-installed.

Take this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Arc Capacitor W/17l-15P
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Multi-Tool. This specialised tool comes with an Advanced Mining Laser and powerful Optical Drill upgrade pre-installed.

Take this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Hunevar's Dream Charger
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Multi-Tool. This specialised tool comes with several scanning upgrades pre-installed, to increase the efficiency and profitability of scanning planetary discoveries.

Take this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Imperfect Loop Reflector
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Multi-Tool. This rifle comes with the deadly Pulse Spitter and explosive Plasma Launcher pre-installed.

Take this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Multi-Tool Upgrade Pack
allItems.Description:
A bundle of upgrades compatible with all person Multi-Tools.

Includes a Multi-Tool Expansion Slot, which may be wired into a Multi-Tool at a Space Station Multi-Tool Upgrade Rack, as well as a unique Upgrade Module, which can be immediately installed by hand to enhance an existing Multi-Tool technology.

allItems.Name: RGB Firework Pack
allItems.Description:
A three-variety pack of luxury fireworks. Rich in cadmium, emeril and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Myth Beacon
allItems.Description:
The result of Nada's research into unusual patterns detected in the stories of the Gek, Korvax, and Vy'keen.

The beacon broadcasts a signal echo attuned to the shift historiographical flux mapped by Nada's Traveller companions.

Specialist Polo is unwilling to predict the results of the broadcast.

allItems.Name: Historiographical Dosimeter
allItems.Description:
Nada has detected a new pattern emerging in the stories of the Gek, Korvax, and Vy'keen.

The dosimeter measures exposure to historiographical flux around key artifact sites. Recordings of unusual historical shifts will enable Nada to trace the signal.

Assist Nada and Polo in their research by using this device to transmit historial data from alien artifact sites.

allItems.Name: Title: 'Renegade'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the 'Beachhead' Expedition, and your success in tracking the renegade historical echo.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Title: 'Paragon'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the 'Beachhead' Expedition, and your success in tracking the renegade historical echo.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: SSV Normandy SR1
allItems.Description:
The SSV Normandy SR1 is a one-of-a-kind 'deep scout' frigate. This legendary ship represents peace and cooperation between races, and commemorates completion of the 'Beachhead' Expedition.

Recruiting this frigate will add it to your fleet. Manage your frigate fleet from a Fleet Command Room aboard your freighter, and consult your Navigator to deploy frigates on lucrative expeditions.

allItems.Name: Title: 'Globemaster'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the 'Cartographers' Expedition, and your success in documenting and then escaping from the expedition planet.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Cartographers Expedition Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates your success in documenting and then escaping from the expedition planet.

allItems.Name: Cartographers Expedition Banner
allItems.Description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the 'Cartographers' Expedition, and your success in documenting and then escaping from the expedition planet.

Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Jetpack Bubble Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

Specially condition oil is added to the jetpack's exhaust jets, creating a stream of pearlescent bubbles as it operates.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Whispering Companion Egg
allItems.Description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!

A shadow writhes beneath the egg's protective membrane.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be nightmarish and soul-consuming.

allItems.Name: VV5 Ariyaz
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship, pre-fitted with a powerful Phase Beam and upgraded Pulse Engine for efficient space exploration. The Teleport Receiver also allows for gathered products and materials to be efficiently teleported back to the ship over long distances.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Jirishi's Prospect
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship, pre-fitted with an upgraded Hyperdrive for efficient galactic exploration.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Hadach's Discovery KH3
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship, pre-fitted with an upgraded Infra-Knife for efficient destruction of hostile ships.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Ultimate Sleep LO1
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship with a spacious cargo hold, and pre-fitted with upgraded Deflector Shields and a Cyclotron Ballista.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: Hiwamiha of Destiny
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Starship, pre-fitted with an upgraded Positron Ejector for efficient destruction of hostile ships.

Claim this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU).

allItems.Name: P. Sheptefalae Egg
allItems.Description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!

The armoured beast within - part crystal, part flesh - rattles gently against the egg.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be deeply devoted to protecting its master.

allItems.Name: J. Croconakeum Egg
allItems.Description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!

The graceful creature within beats its soft wings against the egg, impatient to be hatched.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be a diligent companion, scouting for resources from great heights.

allItems.Name: G. Oestridinzeus Egg
allItems.Description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!

The weight inside this egg shifts constantly, as though the creature within is bouncing energetically.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be a sweet tempered companion, soothed by gentle interactions.

allItems.Name: V. Pentaamqum Egg
allItems.Description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!

The scaly reptile within scrapes its claws against the egg, hungry to prove its ferocity.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be a fierce hunter, defeating prey and rival creatures with powerful jaws.

allItems.Name: Z. Falynascria Egg
allItems.Description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!

The insect within clicks its great horns, eager to hatch and explore the universe.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be deeply adventurous, curious to explore planets beyond its marshy homeworld.

allItems.Name: RGB Firework Pack
allItems.Description:
A three-variety pack of luxury fireworks. Rich in cadmium, emeril and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: RGB Firework Pack
allItems.Description:
A three-variety pack of luxury fireworks. Rich in cadmium, emeril and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: RGB Firework Pack
allItems.Description:
A three-variety pack of luxury fireworks. Rich in cadmium, emeril and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: RGB Firework Pack
allItems.Description:
A three-variety pack of luxury fireworks. Rich in cadmium, emeril and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: RGB Firework Pack
allItems.Description:
A three-variety pack of luxury fireworks. Rich in cadmium, emeril and indium. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Blue Stargaze Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts an explorer gazing toward the stars in a soft blue sky.

allItems.Name: Red Strider Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts a colossal alien beast striding across a rust-coloured landscape.

allItems.Name: Landed Ship Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts a landed starship, awaiting the return of its pilot.

allItems.Name: Purple Galactic Core Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts a pair of starships journeying towards a galactic core.

allItems.Name: Lost Bathysphere Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts a legendary haunted diving mask.

allItems.Name: Space Anomaly Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal depicts a starship pulsing past Nada and Polo's anomalous home.

allItems.Name: Full Sail
allItems.Description: This full sail replicates the design of the ancient maritime trade vessels of the Gek, and makes for a striking nautical-themed home decoration.

allItems.Name: Offset Sails
allItems.Description: These offset sails replicate the design of the ancient maritime trade vessels of the Gek, and make for a striking nautical-themed home decoration.

allItems.Name: Asymmetrical Sails
allItems.Description: These asymmetrical sails replicate the design of the ancient maritime trade vessels of the Gek, and make for a striking nautical-themed home decoration.

allItems.Name: Draped Canvas
allItems.Description: This draped canvas half-sail replicates the design of the ancient maritime trade vessels of the Gek, and makes for a striking nautical-themed home decoration.

allItems.Name: Black & Gold Traveller Poster
allItems.Description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This sumptuous black and gold poster depicts a Traveller in the likeness of Apollo.

allItems.Name: Anomalous Home Poster
allItems.Description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This brightly-coloured poster depicts a wireframe illustration of the Space Anomaly.

allItems.Name: Milk? Poster
allItems.Description:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster depicts a delicious, creamy glass of warm Proto-Milk.

allItems.Name: Writhing Manuscript
allItems.Description:
A translucent sheet of worm-vellum, inscribed with a fanatical text. It writhes when touched.

'The children were the first to notice.
A thump thump thump, thundering deep below the sand.
The first worm split the sky like black lightning as it leapt overhead. 
Worm by worm, they rose from the desert. Migrating.
Every storm season, we each hope to be chosen. We arrange ourselves in lines across the desert, arms lifted to the sky.
Anyone may enter the maw.
We are all equal under the great worms.'

allItems.Name: Fleshy Rope
allItems.Description:
The coiled remains of a Hungering Tendril's digestive tract. Though its meaty walls still convulse, there is surely no way for a fresh tendril to regrow from these meagre scraps...

Such specialist offal is rarely traded on the Galactic Exchange and is thus highly valuable.

allItems.Name: Vile Spawn
allItems.Description:
The fragile embryo of a Hungering Tendril, still dripping with mucal butter. It wails and recoils when touched.

May be extracted from embryotic sacs with the aid of a Visceral Synthesiser.

allItems.Name: Flesh Launcher
allItems.Description:
A luxury firework. These organic pyrotechnics rocket into the sky and explode in a splatter of slime, plasma and wormlets. Ignite to create disgusting displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Flesh Launcher Pack
allItems.Description:
A pack of luxury fireworks. These organic pyrotechnics rocket into the sky and explode in a splatter of slime, mucus, and wormlets. Ignite to create disgusting displays in the sky.

Place launch tube via the Build Menu (BUILD_MENU). Warning: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

allItems.Name: Title: 'Worm Lord'
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Explorer Title, commemorating completion of the Emergence expedition.

Apply this title to your banner at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Emergence Expedition Decal
allItems.Description:
An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the Emergence expedition.

allItems.Name: Emergence Expedition Banner
allItems.Description:
Equip this exclusive Personal Flair in commemoration of the Emergence expedition.
Apply this banner to your profile at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Ghastly Trail
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

Attaches an active bio-chamber to the Jetpack's exhaust nozzles. During flight, the thrusters warm and expel the slimy juice contained within.
Note: Contains living worms. Ejected worms may infest local ecosystems.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Sandworm Egg
allItems.Description:
A living, fertile egg, ready to hatch!

Curled within the shell is a hungry wormlet, its coils rippling restlessly.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be cursed and insatiable.

allItems.Name: Titanic Trophy
allItems.Description:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

This many-toothed skull once belonged to a large legless vertebrate, cousin to the titan sandworm. The powerful jaws can exert enough force to crush a Multi-Tool, and the bones of most creatures.

allItems.Name: Feasting Casque
allItems.Description:
An exclusive Exosuit Appearance Override.

Redistribute your facial organs and alarm other explorers by assuming the appearance of a sandworm cultist. This bio-silicone helmet is sealed against all known planetary hazards, but may feel slightly clammy to the wearer.

Ritualistically transform the head of your Vy'keen appearance at an Appearance Modifier.

allItems.Name: Wormskin Folio: 1
allItems.Description:
Ancient words are carved into this living document. They read:

'The worm lord towers above the dusty earth; its flesh becomes the sky.
Our pathetic shells cannot follow, cannot reach its height, cannot reach its depths.
We offer ourselves to the ground.
We beg our sacrifice accepted.'

allItems.Name: Wormskin Folio: 2
allItems.Description:
Ancient words are carved into this living document. They read:

'The dust was choking. 
Our eyes reddened and watered. 
But the truth was inescapable.
The veins of the Atlas had surfaced.'

allItems.Name: Wormskin Folio: 3
allItems.Description:
Ancient words are carved into this living document. They read:

'Now with every storm we beg to be chosen;
Arms to the sky, faces to the dirt, calling out with all we have!
When heavy raindrops hit the earth, the veins of Atlas answer.
The rapture of our consumption is beyond words.'

allItems.Name: Wormskin Folio: 4
allItems.Description:
Ancient words are carved into this living document. They read:

'We tumble as it swallows, but grip the slick walls as best we can - 
Oh! - to reach the gizzard still awake. 
Breathe it deeply! How our lungs gurgle!
The slime clogs our noses and stings our eyes, 
though in this warm darkness, we are already blind.'

allItems.Name: Wormskin Folio: 5
allItems.Description:
Ancient words are carved into this living document. They read:

'Curse the agony of regurgitation, 
Curse this this feeble flesh that still confines me!
My brethren were reborn, rising from the blessed dust as fresh tendrils. 
Glistening capillaries to the great veins, slithering away into the sand.
I will be patient. Until the next storm.'

allItems.Name: Planetary Chart
allItems.Description:
A map of a nearby planet. A secure site of interest has been marked. Such sites often hold blueprints for new products.

Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

allItems.Name: Planetary Chart
allItems.Description:
A map of a nearby planet. The coordinates of a distress signal have been marked.

Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

allItems.Name: Planetary Chart
allItems.Description:
A map of a nearby planet. An inhabited outpost of some kind has been marked.

Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

allItems.Name: Planetary Chart
allItems.Description:
A map of a nearby planet. An ancient artifact site has been marked.

Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

allItems.Name: Planetary Chart
allItems.Description:
A map of a nearby planet. An ancient artifact site has been marked.

Select the map and use Plot Route (FE_ALT1) to pin the location in your Exosuit display.

New maps can be gained by exchanging Navigation Data with a Space Station Cartographer.

allItems.Name: Aquatic Treasure (Common)
allItems.Description:
A well-preserved marine treasure, found deep under the ocean. It was protected from the elements by a thick sea-chest, and is at least (2 - 5)00 years old.

Highly valuable to collectors of ancient artifacts.

allItems.Name: Aquatic Treasure (Uncommon)
allItems.Description:
A well-preserved marine treasure, found deep under the ocean. It was protected from the elements by a thick sea-chest, and is at least (6 - 11)00 years old.

Highly valuable to collectors of ancient artifacts.

allItems.Name: Aquatic Treasure (Rare)
allItems.Description:
A well-preserved marine treasure, found deep under the ocean. It was protected from the elements by a thick sea-chest, and is at least (14 - 30)00 years old.

Highly valuable to collectors of ancient artifacts.

allItems.Name: Terrifying Sample (Common)
allItems.Description:
An appalling relic, the haunted remains of some abyssal horror. It has lived at least (2 - 5)0 lifetimes, and will live many more again.

Will stalk the bearer across the galaxy and the next, unless it is sold before the curse can take effect.

allItems.Name: Terrifying Sample (Uncommon)
allItems.Description:
An appalling relic, the haunted remains of some abyssal horror. It has lived at least (6 - 11)0 lifetimes, and will live many more again.

Will stalk the bearer across the galaxy and the next, unless it is sold before the curse can take effect.

allItems.Name: Terrifying Sample (Rare)
allItems.Description:
An appalling relic, the haunted remains of some abyssal horror. It has lived at least (14 - 30)0 lifetimes, and will live many more again.

Will stalk the bearer across the galaxy and the next, unless it is sold before the curse can take effect.

allItems.Name: Ancient Skeleton (Common)
allItems.Description:
Approximately (250 - 500)00 years old, and made from pure gold.

These bones are unlike those of any terrestial creature. The remains of a true deep-space leviathan.

allItems.Name: Ancient Skeleton (Uncommon)
allItems.Description:
Approximately (600 - 1100)00 years old, and made from pure gold.

These bones are unlike those of any terrestial creature. The remains of a true deep-space leviathan.

allItems.Name: Ancient Skeleton (Rare)
allItems.Description:
Approximately (1400 - 3000)00 years old, and made from pure gold.

These bones are unlike those of any terrestial creature. The remains of a true deep-space leviathan.

allItems.Name: Mainframe Access Card (Common)
allItems.Description:
%OFFICER%'s security pass from the %FREIGHTER%. It is warped and pockmarked, its surface melted by some unknown substance.

Records indicate it was last used %DAYS% days ago.

allItems.Name: Mainframe Access Card (Uncommon)
allItems.Description:
%OFFICER%'s security pass from the %FREIGHTER%. A rusty, dark red substance has congealed across its surface.

Records indicate it was last used %DAYS% days ago.

allItems.Name: Mainframe Access Card (Rare)
allItems.Description:
%OFFICER%'s security pass from the %FREIGHTER%. The pass is unnervingly pristine, almost as if coated in a substance that repels all other material.

Records indicate it was last used %DAYS% days ago.

allItems.Description: Official Record

allItems.Name: Official Record (Uncommon)
allItems.Description: Official Record

allItems.Name: Official Record (Rare)
allItems.Description: Official Record

allItems.Description: Official Record

allItems.Name: Official Record (Uncommon)
allItems.Description: Official Record

allItems.Name: Official Record (Rare)

allItems.Name: Recovered Item (Common)
allItems.Description:
A scrap of organic matter. It is not clear if this is a lifeform in its own right, or some ejected/severed part of a larger being.

Unlikely to be desirable at a galactic exchange. Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and use FE_ALT1 to process it into useful materials.

allItems.Name: Recovered Item (Uncommon)
allItems.Description:
A scrap of organic matter. It is not clear if this is a lifeform in its own right, or some ejected/severed part of a larger being.

Unlikely to be desirable at a galactic exchange. Select in the Inventory (INVENTORY) and use FE_ALT1 to process it into useful materials.
