allItems.Name: Salvaged Fleet Exploration Unit
allItems.Description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.

Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the exploration abilities of your fleet.

allItems.Name: Salvaged Fleet Exploration Unit
allItems.Description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.

Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the exploration abilities of your fleet.

allItems.Name: Salvaged Fleet Exploration Unit
allItems.Description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.

Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the exploration abilities of your fleet.

allItems.Name: Salvaged Fleet Exploration Unit
allItems.Description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.

Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the exploration abilities of your fleet.

allItems.Name: Salvaged Fleet Mining Unit
allItems.Description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.

Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the mining capabilities of your fleet.

allItems.Name: Salvaged Fleet Mining Unit
allItems.Description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.

Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the mining capabilities of your fleet.

allItems.Name: Salvaged Fleet Mining Unit
allItems.Description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.

Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the mining capabilities of your fleet.

allItems.Name: Salvaged Fleet Mining Unit
allItems.Description:
A deployable freighter upgrade, salvaged from %NAME%.

Can be re-deployed into your own capital ship to improve the mining capabilities of your fleet.

allItems.Name: Carbon
allItems.Description:
The building block of all organic life. Of critical importance to space travellers, as Carbon is used to recharge mining equipment.
 
The Mining Laser will harvest Carbon from trees, plants, and all other forms of vegetable.

allItems.Name: Condensed Carbon
allItems.Description:
Advanced material, processed from regular carbon in a Refiner.

The increased molecule density offers a substantially improved energy-per-gram ratio.

Occasionally found in crystalline form. Harvesting large crystals may require a Advanced Mining Laser.

allItems.Name: Oxygen
allItems.Description:
Integral to the atmospheric filtering technology at the heart of the exosuit life support system.

Exosuit material processing allows oxygen to be harvested directly from appropriate planetary flora.

Other plantlife may be scanned with the Analysis Visor to reveal alternative oxygen supplies.

allItems.Name: Hexite
allItems.Description: An odourless, mineral-rich substance with a hexagonal crystalline structure, harvested from the faecal matter of a creature.

allItems.Name: Di-hydrogen
allItems.Description:
A stable, crystalline form of hydrogen remarkable both for its extreme energy density and its stability at atmospheric pressures.

Common to all worlds, Di-hydrogen is found in the form of large blue crystals. It is a key component of Starship Launch Fuel.

allItems.Name: Deuterium
allItems.Description:
A stable hydrogen isotope used heavily in both small-scale fusion reactors and neutron-scattering shield technology.

Deuterium very rarely occurs naturally. Most of the galaxy's supply comes from the processing of Di-hydrogen and Tritium in Refiners.

allItems.Name: Tritium
allItems.Description:
Radioactive isotope commonly used to fuel the fusion reactor at the heart of starship Pulse Engines.

Abundant in interstellar asteroid fields, Tritium can be mined from asteroids using starship weaponry.

allItems.Name: Ferrite Dust
allItems.Description:
An abundant mineral element, found in rock formations and other areas of geological interest. Easily extracted using a Mining Laser.

Typically requires processing in a Refiner before use in construction or technology manufacture.

allItems.Name: Pure Ferrite
allItems.Description:
Processed metal, free of dust and pebbles. Used to construct a wide variety of structures and technologies.

Typically purified from Ferrite dust using a Refiner, but can occasionally be found in large deposits. Collection may require an Advanced Mining Laser.

allItems.Name: Magnetised Ferrite
allItems.Description:
Highly processed metal, requiring several stages of processing in a Refiner.

Used in the creation of advanced structures and technologies. Avoid ingestion.

allItems.Name: Silicate Powder
allItems.Description:
An abundant mineral element, found within the geological strata of all rocky worlds. Easily extracted using a Terrain Manipulator. Create a tunnel anywhere to begin extraction.

Process in a Refiner to create Glass.

allItems.Name: Sodium
allItems.Description:
A powerful catalyst, useful for charging defensive technologies such as shields or hazard protection.
 
Exosuit material handling technology allows automatic harvesting from appropriate <CATALYSTsodium-rich flora.

A vital ingredient in the creation of many advanced devices, products and components.

allItems.Name: Sodium Nitrate
allItems.Description:
An advanced catalyst, useful for charging defensive technologies such as shields or hazard protection.
 
Created in a Refiner, or occasionally found in crystalline form on a planet's surface.

Offers a substantially improved energy-per-gram ratio over regular Sodium.

allItems.Name: Cobalt
allItems.Description:
Mined from underground minerals, cobalt is found in plentiful supply in caves and caverns. Useful in the manufacture of Ion Batteries.

It is used in the creation of several technologies and structures, and can be processed in a Refiner to make the most of its inherent charge.

allItems.Name: Ionised Cobalt
allItems.Description:
A highly energised form of Cobalt, this processed metal can be used to create Advanced Ion Batteries, a conveniently portable source of energy for the Exosuit.

In widespread use as a key component in the creation of advanced technologies and structures.

allItems.Name: Salt
allItems.Description:
A naturally occuring salt, found in abundance in underwater minerals.

Can be processed in a Refiner to create Chlorine. This refined form is used in the manufacture of advanced products and technologies.

allItems.Name: Chlorine
allItems.Description:
A reactive element most easily harvested by processing the salt-infused minerals found in oceans.

Used in the manufacture of advanced technologies.

allItems.Name: Cyto-Phosphate
allItems.Description:
A blue-green organic compound produced during the metabolic cycle of deep-sea plantlife. Rich in soluble energy, cyto-phosphates are crucial in many submarine technologies.
 
The Mining Laser will harvest cyto-phosphate compounds from underwater flora.

allItems.Name: Copper
allItems.Description:
A chromatic metal, generated by fusion in the heart of a star. Such stellar material ends up forming deposits in the crust of local planets.

Copper is found on planets orbiting yellow stars, and can be placed in a Refiner to create purified Chromatic Metal for use in the manufacture of advanced technologies.

allItems.Name: Cadmium
allItems.Description:
A chromatic metal, generated by fusion in the heart of a star. Such stellar material ends up forming deposits in the crust of local planets.

Cadmium is found on planets orbiting red stars, and can be placed in a Refiner to create purified Chromatic Metal for use in the manufacture of advanced technologies.

allItems.Name: Emeril
allItems.Description:
A chromatic metal, generated by fusion in the heart of a star.

Emeril is found on planets orbiting green stars, and can be placed in a Refiner to create purified Chromatic Metal for use in the manufacture of advanced technologies.

allItems.Name: Indium
allItems.Description:
A chromatic metal, generated by fusion in the heart of a star. Such stellar material ends up forming deposits in the crust of local planets.

Indium is found on planets orbiting blue stars, and can be placed in a Refiner to create purified Chromatic Metal for use in the manufacture of advanced technologies.

allItems.Name: Chromatic Metal
allItems.Description:
A processed metal alloy, created in a Refiner from the stellar metals: Copper, Cadmium, Emeril and Indium.

The rarer the stellar metal, the more Chromatic Metal it will produce.

This valuable metal is used in the creation of many advanced technologies.

allItems.Name: Paraffinium
allItems.Description:
Local mineral extract, typically found in large deposits or extracted from common minerals after inspection with an Analysis Visor.

Typically found on planets with a tropical environment.

allItems.Name: Pyrite
allItems.Description:
Local mineral extract, typically found in large deposits or extracted from common minerals after inspection with an Analysis Visor.

Typically found on planets with a desert environment.

allItems.Name: Ammonia
allItems.Description:
Local mineral extract, typically found in large deposits or extracted from common minerals after inspection with an Analysis Visor.

Typically found on planets with a toxic environment.

allItems.Name: Uranium
allItems.Description:
Local mineral extract, typically found in large deposits or extracted from common minerals after inspection with an Analysis Visor.

Typically found on planets with a radioactive environment.

allItems.Name: Dioxite
allItems.Description:
Local mineral extract, typically found in large deposits or extracted from common minerals after inspection with an Analysis Visor.

Typically found on planets with a frozen environment.

allItems.Name: Phosphorus
allItems.Description:
Local mineral extract, typically found in large deposits or extracted from common minerals after inspection with an Analysis Visor.

Typically found on planets with a scorched environment.

allItems.Name: Mordite
allItems.Description:
Despite much study, little is known about this haunting, crystalline compound.

It is released from the cadavers of dying creatures, but can also be specifically cultivated and harvested from the Mordite Root plant.

allItems.Name: Pugneum
allItems.Description:
This oily, unsettling liquid leaks from the circuitry of Sentinels.

Prized by the Vy'keen, Pugneum is thought to share some essential properties with Nanites. It hums in a sinister fashion upon contact with organic matter.

allItems.Name: Silver
allItems.Description:
Valuable interstellar trading mineral, typically mined from asteroids. Occasionally found in underground planetary deposits.

Prized by people in all systems for its lustre and shine.

allItems.Name: Gold
allItems.Description:
Highly valuable interstellar trading mineral, typically mined from asteroids. Occasionally found in underground planetary deposits.

Universally prized for its beauty and versatility.

allItems.Name: Platinum
allItems.Description:
Extremely valuable interstellar trading mineral, typically mined from asteroids. Occasionally found in underground planetary deposits.

Universally prized for its hardiness and versatility.

allItems.Name: Sulphurine
allItems.Description:
A pungent atmospheric gas. High concentrations are extremely hazardous to organic life.

With the aid of specialised machinery, can be extracted from the atmospheres of Scorched and Desert planets.

allItems.Name: Radon
allItems.Description:
A colourless, odourless gas with a relatively short half-life. 

Found in both Radioactive and Frozen atmospheres, this gas is produced by the decay of other high-energy elements.

allItems.Name: Nitrogen
allItems.Description:
A reactive atmospheric gas found wherever there is organic life.

Nitrogen is readily harvested from the atmospheres of Lush and Toxic planets.

allItems.Name: Activated Copper
allItems.Description:
A chromatic metal, generated by fusion in the heart of a star.

This Copper has been activated by the extreme conditions in which it was formed, and is highly valuable.

Copper is found on planets orbiting yellow stars, and can be placed in a Refiner to create purified Chromatic Metal.

allItems.Name: Activated Cadmium
allItems.Description:
A chromatic metal, generated by fusion in the heart of a star.

This Cadmium has been activated by the extreme conditions in which it was formed, and is highly valuable.

Cadmium is found on planets orbiting red stars, and can be placed in a Refiner to create purified Chromatic Metal.

allItems.Name: Activated Emeril
allItems.Description:
A chromatic metal, generated by fusion in the heart of a star.

This Emeril has been activated by the extreme conditions in which it was formed, and is highly valuable.

Emeril is found on planets orbiting green stars, and can be placed in a Refiner to create purified Chromatic Metal.

allItems.Name: Activated Indium
allItems.Description:
A chromatic metal, generated by fusion in the heart of a star.

Indium is found on planets orbiting blue stars, and can be placed in a Refiner to create purified Chromatic Metal.

This Indium has been activated by the extreme conditions in which it was formed, and is highly valuable.

allItems.Name: Fungal Mould
allItems.Description:
An oddly-glowing substance, harvested from the gills of Fungal Clusters.

The host plant requires a toxic climate to thrive in the wild, but can be farmed in all environments with the aid of a Hydroponics Tray.

allItems.Name: Frost Crystal
allItems.Description:
A beautiful blue crystal, this organic compound possesses both great hardiness and a shimmering translucence. It is harvested from the leaves of Frostwort.

Frostwort requires frozen conditions to thrive in the wild, but can be farmed in all environments with the aid of a Hydroponics Tray.

allItems.Name: Gamma Root
allItems.Description:
A strange substance that seems to slowly shift the air around it. It is found in the roots of the Gamma Weed plant.

Gamma Weed requires high background radiation to thrive in the wild, but can be farmed in all environments with the aid of a Hydroponics Tray.

allItems.Name: Cactus Flesh
allItems.Description:
Succulent, edible cactus flesh from the Echinocactus plant. As well as being juicy on the tongue, the flesh has many industrial uses.

The Echinocactus thrives only on desert planets, but can be farmed in all environments with the aid of a Hydroponics Tray..

allItems.Name: Solanium
allItems.Description:
A powerful chemical that has resisted attempts at synthesis. It can be harvested from the bark of the Solar Vine.

The vine requires a hot climate to thrive in the wild, but can be farmed in all environments with the aid of a Hydroponics Tray.

allItems.Name: Star Bulb
allItems.Description:
A beautiful gemstone, this prized product is the engorged, luminescent berry of the Star Bramble.

The host plant requires lush conditions to thrive in the wild, but can be farmed in all environments with the aid of a Hydroponics Tray.

allItems.Name: Marrow Bulb
allItems.Description:
A glowing organic bulb, harvested from the Cave Marrow plant found growing underground.

The Cave Marrow has proved resistant to domestication, and no farmable cultivars are known to exist. As such, marrow bulbs must be harvested by hand in the wild.

allItems.Name: Kelp Sac
allItems.Description:
A rubbery, luminescent sac harvested from underwater Candle Kelp plants.

Agricultural science has not yet tamed the Candle Kelp. As such, these sacs cannot be farmed.

allItems.Name: Faecium
allItems.Description:
A foul-smelling compound that can be harvested from the Gutrot Flower, or less desirably from the faecal matter of some species.

Creatures can be fed to encourage the formation and deposition of faecium crystals.

allItems.Name: Residual Goop
allItems.Description:
A pulsating, foul smelling goop that builds up in poorly-maintained machinery.

Skin contact is not advised.

allItems.Name: Runaway Mould
allItems.Description:
An out of control mould growth that builds up in poorly-maintained machinery.

Likely to be several different species of mould, merged together into one super-colony.

allItems.Name: Rusted Metal
allItems.Description:
Handfuls of corroded metal, distorted by years of exposure to the harsh environment.

Handle with care.

allItems.Name: Living Slime
allItems.Description:
A heavy, oozing slime. It is moving gently, as if it has a heartbeat of its own.

Nutrient source: unknown.

allItems.Name: Viscous Fluids
allItems.Description:
An unnaturally thick liquid of dubious colour. Its origins are impossible to fathom.

Appears to have some mild magnetic properties.

allItems.Name: Nanite Cluster
allItems.Description:
A dense miasma of Nanites, undulating in its potentiality. These clusters are stable, but unrestricted nanite foam can produce undesirable runaway reactions in the presence of organic matter.

Used in the construction of advanced technologies. Highly valuable to specialist traders.

allItems.Name: QUICKSILVER
allItems.Description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

allItems.Name: UNITS
allItems.Description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

allItems.Name: Liquid Sun
allItems.Description:
Conventional planetary metal, superheated and then held in a stablised plasmatic form.

Extracted from metallic terrain deposits using a Solar Ray. Enormously energetic.

allItems.Name: Fragmented Qualia
allItems.Description:
A pattern, no more than a mere waveform, etched into the surface of a tiny metallic shard. This fragment of data represents a recording of the electrical impulses running across a neural network. Many fragments would be required to recreate any sensible experience.

Generated by the interaction of the Animus Beam with a living target.

allItems.Name: Basalt
allItems.Description:
Local mineral extract, typically found in large deposits or extracted from common minerals after inspection with an Analysis Visor.

Typically found on planets with a volcanic environment.

allItems.Name: Tainted Metal
allItems.Description:
Shredded fragments of a soft, grey metal. Its surface is porous, and when touched it oozes ever-so-slightly.

Found in the creaking wreck of a derelict freighter. The space station Scrap Dealer may find this interesting...

allItems.Name: MERCHANTS
allItems.Description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

allItems.Name: EXPLORERS
allItems.Description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

allItems.Name: MERCENARIES
allItems.Description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

allItems.Name: GEK
allItems.Description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

allItems.Name: KORVAX
allItems.Description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

allItems.Name: VY'KEEN
allItems.Description: Currency or faction standing, given as a reward.

allItems.Name: Cursed Dust
allItems.Description:
A powdery desert soil, slick with the gland expressions of a colossal sandworm. Historically, some have regarded this dust as the divine parent of such worms. It smells curiously sweet.

Cursed Dust gathers in the terrain deposits of planets blighted by titan worm activity.

allItems.Name: Hazard Protection
allItems.Description:
The Exosuit's Hazard Protection system continually monitors and stabilises the user's environment. 

General reactive protection may be augmented with Environmental Shields, offering increased protection against specific conditions.

The device is charged with sodium-based substances. User is advised that a failure to charge the Hazard Protection system may allow their environment to become incompatible with life.

allItems.Name: Shield Lattice
allItems.Description: Increases the base capacity of the Hazard Protection system, allowing the user to spend longer in hazardous environments without recharging their Exosuit.

allItems.Name: Life Support
allItems.Description:
The core of the Exosuit, the Life Support System continually filters and pumps breathable Oxygen.

In addition to its role in the continued existence of the Exosuit user, the Life Support Unit uses surplus oxygen to generate power for secondary systems, such as the Jetpack, Speed Augmentation and Torch.

allItems.Name: Oxygen Recycler
allItems.Description: Increases the base capacity of the Life Support system, allowing the user to go longer between charges.

allItems.Name: Jetpack
allItems.Description:
Provides the Exosuit with advanced movement capabilities, including temporary flight.

Control thrust with JUMP. The flightpack uses energy from the Exosuit Life Support system to pressurise and vent bursts of gas, propelling the user into the air.

Jetpack can be temporarily overloaded by gathering Deuterium-rich plants, causing a dramatic increase in available thrust.

allItems.Name: Neural Stimulator
allItems.Description: Increases the capacity of the Exosuit's Jetpack Tanks and Adrenal Pump Reserves, allowing the user to both fly and sprint longer.

allItems.Name: Rocket Boots
allItems.Description:
Equips the Exosuit jetpack with advanced jump capabilities, allowing the user to take huge leaps with ease.

Activate jump systems by rapidly pressing JUMP.

allItems.Name: Coolant Network
allItems.Description:
User is guarded from extreme heat damage on scorched worlds.

Provides relief from intense atmospheric and solar heat through a threaded dermal distribution network of liquid frenium.

Device is charged by mineral extracts found in hot environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

allItems.Name: Thermic Layer
allItems.Description:
User is guarded from extreme cold damage on frozen worlds.

Heat capillaries threaded through a user's suit that evenly distributes liquid calidium to maintain a comfortable body temperature.

Device is charged by mineral extracts found in frozen environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

allItems.Name: Toxic Suppressor
allItems.Description:
User is protected from toxic damage.

Reactive compounds within the Suppressor remove toxic liquids that fall on the user, thereby reducing peril and choking hazards.

Device is charged by mineral extracts found in toxic environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

allItems.Name: Radiation Deflector
allItems.Description:
User is shielded from radiation damage.

Greatly reduces user peril during the exploration of irradiated worlds. Micro-vibrations increase electromagnetic wave reflection, thereby reducing absorption.

Device is charged by mineral extracts found in radioactive environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

allItems.Name: Aeration Membrane
allItems.Description:
User is able to swim underwater for extended periods.

Absorbs gases dissolved in water through a membrane contactor that, if user is of a conventionally structured species, is placed over the mouth or facial breathing hole.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.

allItems.Name: Haz-Mat Gauntlet
allItems.Description:
Upgrades the metallic shielding of the Exosuit's gloves.

An advanced blend of reinforced metal and catalytic shielding allows the user to safely handle hazardous substances, as well perform the necessary feats of strength required to harvest certain farmable flora.

allItems.Name: Remembrance
allItems.Description: Everything you ever knew is within.

allItems.Name: Star Seed
allItems.Description:
The smallest of sparks, housed within a containment field of unknown origins.

The seed glows with life, desperate to escape and fulfill its potential.

allItems.Name: Obsolete Technology
allItems.Description:
A piece of technology, corrupted by interference from the Atlas.

Can be recycled for usable components.

allItems.Name: Efficient Water Jets
allItems.Description:
Improves the fuel efficiency of the jetpack's marine jets, reducing the drain on Exosuit life support systems.

Aqueous compressor units are installed into the jetpack's turbines, bypassing the large energy requirements of underwater ignition.

allItems.Name: Oxygen Rerouter
allItems.Description:
Upgrades the Aeration Membrane of the Exosuit to harvest oxygen from the Life Support system in the event of a breathing emergency, allowing the user to resurface and seek conventional fuel supplies.

Note: Long-term conversion of life support energy to breathable gas is not recommended, and may result in life no longer being supported.

allItems.Name: Simple Translator
allItems.Description:
A automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.

Low memory capacity on this entry-level model limits translation capacity.

allItems.Name: Superior Translator
allItems.Description:
A automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.

Parallel language processors enable a greater proportion of recorded speech to be translated.

allItems.Name: Advanced Translator
allItems.Description:
A automatic translation device. It records and parses nearby conversations before running the data through a contextual learning system to determine intended meaning.

A large memory array and overclocked language processors allow the real-time translation of significant chunks of speech.

allItems.Name: Artemis' Translator
allItems.Description:
A automatic translation device. Device must be calibrated by pre-loading with existing translation data. Device must have network connection to Artemis to function.

Without access to host translation service, on-board circuit allows limited real-time translation of a small number of words.

allItems.Name: Pulse Engine
allItems.Description:
Spaceflight propulsion, boosts and on-demand Pulse Jumps through local system.
 
User is advised that Tritium is required to charge Pulse Engine. Tritium is abundant in near-space asteroid fields.

Hold ROLLLEFT and ROLLRIGHT together to engage Pulse Jump.
Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

allItems.Name: Photonix Core
allItems.Description: Provides increased manoeuvrability and longer boosts during spaceflight.

allItems.Name: Launch Thruster
allItems.Description:
Vital launch and landing gear system.
 
User is advised that specialised, Deuterium-derived fuel is required to recharge thruster. Launch procedures require sufficient fuel levels before activation.
 
Hold THRUST to take off from planet.
Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

allItems.Name: Efficient Thrusters
allItems.Description: Upgrades the starship launch systems, decreasing the fuel cost of takeoff.

allItems.Name: Launch System Recharger
allItems.Description:
Photovoltaic panels fitted to the starship Launch Thrusters allow for a slow trickle charge while the ship is not in operation.

Harvested light is used to fuse di-hydrogen from the atmosphere and over time will refuel the Launch Thrusters automatically.

allItems.Name: Teleport Receiver
allItems.Description:
A device that modulates standard starship communication signals to enable the transport of matter as well as data.

Starships fitted with such a device can send and receive products and substances to a user's exosuit over a long distance.

allItems.Name: Hyperdrive
allItems.Description:
FTL propulsion drive that allows starship to attain warp speed and jump between neighbouring systems.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems through Galactic Map.

allItems.Name: Cadmium Drive
allItems.Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's core bounding magnets, preventing rapid disassembly when attempting to reach rare-class red stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

allItems.Name: Emeril Drive
allItems.Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's shield integrity, preventing reality glitches when attempting to reach rare-class green stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

allItems.Name: Indium Drive
allItems.Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's computational matrix,  preventing temporal anomalies when attempting to reach rare-class blue stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

allItems.Name: Deflector Shield
allItems.Description:
Energy shield that protects spacecraft from laser fire, in-flight projectiles and accidental space debris interaction.

User is advised that catalytic elements are required to recharge device.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's starship inventory.

allItems.Name: Ablative Armour
allItems.Description:
Adds a layer of superheated shielding to the starship's defense array, vaporising incoming fire.

Significantly increases starship shield performance.

allItems.Name: Rocket Launcher
allItems.Description:
Highly destructive weapon that facilitates rapid ship-to-ship destruction.

Press SHIPFIRE to activate.

allItems.Name: Large Rocket Tubes
allItems.Description: Expands the loading chamber of the starship Rocket Launcher, improving exhaust performance and allowing for significantly faster heat recovery.

allItems.Name: Photon Cannon
allItems.Description:
Highly destructive weapon that facilitates rapid ship-to-ship destruction.

Press SHIPFIRE to activate.

allItems.Name: Economy Scanner
allItems.Description: An upgrade to the starship's galactic-scale sensors. This device allows the user to access detailed economic data about a system without having to visit.

allItems.Name: Conflict Scanner
allItems.Description: An upgrade to the starship's galactic-scale sensors. This device allows the user to access conflict data in the galaxy map, without having to put themselves in harm's way.

allItems.Name: Phase Beam
allItems.Description:
Spacefaring beam weapon and asteroid mining tool.

User is advised that organic elements are required to recharge device.

Press SHIPFIRE to activate.

allItems.Name: Fourier De-Limiter
allItems.Description:
Rewires the Phase Beam with nanite-based circuitry, bypassing conventional reality limits on laser power.

Significantly improves heat performance.

allItems.Name: Positron Ejector
allItems.Description:
Shots are granted a wide cone of destruction.

With reduced range and rate of fire, users are encouraged to engage their targets in close proximity.

allItems.Name: Fragment Supercharger
allItems.Description:
Overhauls the firing mechanism of the Positron Ejector, resulting in faster, more accurate particles.

Improves range and accuracy.

allItems.Name: Infra-Knife Accelerator
allItems.Description:
Releases sustained rapid sequences of fire.

User is advised to limit bursts as overheating can occur very rapidly.

allItems.Name: Nonlinear Optics
allItems.Description:
Replaces the conventional Photon Cannon optics with an experimental glass array, boosting combat performance.

Significantly improves heat sink capacity.

allItems.Name: Cyclotron Ballista
allItems.Description: Fires a large, concentrated ball of charged particles at forward targets, causing heavy damage. The charge is non-guided and will continue on its trajectory until it impacts with an obstacle.

allItems.Name: Dyson Pump
allItems.Description:
Replaces the hint sink of the Cyclotron Ballista by encompassing the entire unit with a heat-absorbing megastructure. Heat output is recycled to boost combat efficiency.

Significantly improves heat performance.

allItems.Name: Freighter Hyperdrive
allItems.Description: FTL propulsion drive that allows starship to attain warp speed and jump between neighbouring systems.

allItems.Name: Hull Fracture
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Rusted Circuits
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Shattered Bulwark
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Radiation Leak
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Containment Failure
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Damaged Gears
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Analysis Visor
allItems.Description:
Specialist Discovery and Survey unit.

Augments standard Scanner capabilities by projecting detailed environmental data directly over the user's visor. Allows the identification of distant points of interest.

The Visor will generate valuable data when used to study flora, fauna and minerals.

Hold AIM to operate. Press ZOOM to zoom.

allItems.Name: Scanner
allItems.Description:
A Personal Surface Radar augmentation for the Multi-Tool. 

The Scanner releases a high-energy pulse that reveals any critical survival resources in the immediate area. Data is transmitted via the Exosuit directly into the user's visual nervous system.
 
Press SCAN to activate a local scan.

allItems.Name: Waveform Recycler
allItems.Description:
A powerful lateral processor inserted into the Multi-Tool Scanning System allows the device to recharge at a significantly improved rate.

Increases potential scan frequency.

allItems.Name: Survey Device
allItems.Description:
A self-contained circuitry upgrade for the Analysis Visor, adding real-time terrain analysis to the scanning array.

Toggle between Visor modes with SURVEYFILTERL/SURVEYFILTERR. Use Surveying Mode to detect hidden terrain resources.

allItems.Name: Terrain Manipulator
allItems.Description:
Advanced terraforming device. This module overloads existing multi-tool systems, allowing the user to reshape regions as they wish.

Charged with metallic elements.

allItems.Name: Personal Forcefield
allItems.Description:
On activation, this module draws power from Exosuit Life Support systems to overload the Multi-Tool, distorting the electromagnetic field around the user and creating a powerful personal shield.

While this field offers substantial protection against incoming laser fire, the user is advised that the Multi-Tool cannot be used for other functions while powering the shield.

allItems.Name: Combat Scope
allItems.Description: A recoil-stabilising weapon scope for precise combat.

allItems.Name: Mining Beam
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool Mining Beam powered by Carbon-based Elements. Fire the beam with ATTACK.

Installs focusing optics within the Multi-Tool, allowing it to emit a high-energy beam. The beam is calibrated to excite molecules within common organic or geological objects, allowing it to operate as a highly effective mining device.

WARNING: Destruction of flora, fauna or minerals may attract Sentinel attention.

allItems.Name: Advanced Mining Laser
allItems.Description:
Replaces standard Mining Beam optics with high-grade Living Glass, allowing the beam to be effective against large and/or rare resource deposits.

The lens adapts automatically to minute fluctuations in the beam waveform, minimising scatter and increasing device mining potential.

allItems.Name: Optical Drill
allItems.Description:
Wafer-thin lens arrays are arranged in a highly calibrated matrix, focusing the Mining Beam on an atomic level.

This extra precision allows for highly efficient mining. Elements are extracted more efficiently, increasing the yield from items harvested with the Multi-Tool.

allItems.Name: Boltcaster
allItems.Description:
Generalist weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.

The Boltcaster reconfigures the Multi-Tool to supercharge Metallic Elements, firing them as high-velocity projectiles capable of causing extreme damage.

allItems.Name: Barrel Ioniser
allItems.Description:
Inserts a powerful field ionisation device into the barrel of the Boltcaster, increasing projectile stability through the air.

Improves device accuracy and allows the user to fire for longer periods without degrading combat performance.

allItems.Name: Boltcaster SM
allItems.Description:
Boltcaster shots deliver added physical damage upon impact.

Grants additional kinetic energy to the user's ionised plasma distribution systems.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's Multi-Tool inventory.

allItems.Name: Plasma Resonator
allItems.Description:
A significant upgrade for the Mining Beam.

Upgrades the Mining Laser's primary crystal chamber, boosting core beam energy while decreasing unwanted heat spill.

allItems.Name: Plasma Launcher
allItems.Description:
High-impact projectile weapon. Launched plasma shells bounce off surfaces until their internal timer triggers a large explosion.
 
Charged with Unstable Plasma. Careless use can result in damage to user.
 
Press ALTATTACK to activate.

allItems.Name: Geology Cannon
allItems.Description:
Large-bore projectile launcher. Propels plasma shells designed for rapid ground excavation.
 
Charged with Unstable Plasma. Warning: Explosive hole creation may also damage nearby organic matter.
 
Press ALTATTACK to activate.

allItems.Name: Blaze Javelin
allItems.Description:
Aggressive weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.

The Blaze Javelin delivers instantaneous damage on targets.

Plasma charge process creates an ionised gas arc to propel projectiles at great speed. User will perceive destructive results simultaneous to the pull of the trigger.

allItems.Name: Mass Accelerator
allItems.Description:
Extends the firing chamber of the Blaze Javelin, allowing the internal particle accelerators to reach both greater mass and speed.

Significantly improves weapon damage.

allItems.Name: Scatter Blaster
allItems.Description:
Specialist close combat weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.

The Scatter Blaster reconfigures the Multi-Tool to heat and shatter Metallic Elements, firing them in a wide cone of destruction. Range is limited, but the shrapnel is highly effective at close range.

allItems.Name: Shell Greaser
allItems.Description: Advanced self-lubricating components decrease friction within the Scatter Blaster, offering significant improves to reload times.

allItems.Name: Pulse Spitter
allItems.Description:
Specialist rapid fire weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.

The Pulse Spitter redirects Multi-Tool optics to ionise inserted Metallic Elements. These projectiles are launched in a rapid-fire spread, bombarding potential targets with a wave of high-energy plasma.

allItems.Name: Amplified Cartridges
allItems.Description:
Specialist harmonic resonators allow the Pulse Spitter to split inserted ammunition, effective manufacturing more shots from fewer materials.

Increases weapon clip size.

allItems.Name: Short Circuit
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Blown Transistor
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Damaged Wiring
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Rusted Power Core
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Corrupt Module
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Loom Damage
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Fusion Engine
allItems.Description:
A compact fusion core common to all Exocraft.

Requires fuel to function.

allItems.Name: Drift Suspension
allItems.Description:
Overhauls Exocraft handling values through a combination of software tweaks, pressure adjustments and the insertion of microgravity wells into key suspension components.

Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the Exocraft to drift.

allItems.Name: Grip Boost Suspension
allItems.Description:
Overhauls Exocraft handling values through a combination of software tweaks, pressure adjustments and the insertion of microgravity wells into key suspension components.

Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the Exocraft to turn sharply.

allItems.Name: Hi-Slide Suspension
allItems.Description:
Overhauls Exocraft handling values through a combination of software tweaks, pressure adjustments and the insertion of microgravity wells into key suspension components.

Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the Exocraft to slide.

allItems.Name: Exocraft Signal Booster
allItems.Description:
A large and complex field-based subspace radar.

Due to their large power consumption and inherent subatomic instability, they are found only installed on Exocraft.

Press QUICK_MENU to activate the Signal Booster.

allItems.Name: Exocraft Signal Booster Upgrade Tau
allItems.Description: Allows for additional building types to be acquired by the Exocraft Signal Booster.

allItems.Name: Exocraft Acceleration Module
allItems.Description: An efficient plasma injector coupled to the engine that allows short bursts of speed.

allItems.Name: Exocraft Mining Laser
allItems.Description: A mining laser too cumbersome for handheld operation, they are found only installed on Exocraft.

allItems.Name: Exocraft Mining Laser Upgrade Sigma
allItems.Description: Increases power of the Exocraft Mining Laser.

allItems.Name: Exocraft Mounted Cannon
allItems.Description: Due to the energy requirements of this powerful weapon, they can only be fired from an Exocraft mount.

allItems.Name: Humboldt Drive
allItems.Description:
A thermally-efficient, inversion-proof reactor engine capable of powering the Nautilon even at extreme depths.

Powered by Hydrothermal Fuel Cells.

allItems.Name: Nautilon Cannon
allItems.Description:
A mounted cannon specifically designed for the Nautilon Submarine.

A high-energy weapon system, it superheats a small body of water before launching it rapidly towards the intended target.

Designed primarily for damage against biological entities and inefficient when deployed as a mining device.

allItems.Name: Tethys Beam
allItems.Description:
A mounted laser system specifically designed for the Nautilon Submarine.

Fires a concentrated plasma beam towards the intended target, which is then ignited. Such a trigger mechanism allows the use of high-energy optical mining systems in a liquid medium.

allItems.Name: High-Power Sonar
allItems.Description:
A high-detail sonar device, capable of upgrading the scanner technology aboard a Nautilon-class submarine to Analysis Visor levels.
Press SCAN to activate the High-Power Sonar.

allItems.Name: Osmotic Generator
allItems.Description:
Installed into the drive system aboard the Nautilon Submarine.

Captures energy by exploiting the saline gradient in deep water environments, allowing a slow recharge of the Humboldt Drive in the event of fuel emergencies.

allItems.Name: Locking mechanism
allItems.Description: A simple locking device, designed to keep out unauthorised pilferers. Damage has locked it permanently.

allItems.Name: Magnetic Lock
allItems.Description: An advanced locking device. A polarity incident has caused it to seal shut permanently.

allItems.Name: Superconductive Lock
allItems.Description: A highly advanced locking device. Damage to the circuits supplying the magnet has caused it to lock permanently.

allItems.Name: Input terminal
allItems.Description: A terminal designed to allow manual control of the device. Damage prevents it actually receiving any input.

allItems.Name: Bio-input sensor
allItems.Description: An advanced control unit, designed to allow device/flesh interaction. Damage prevents it functioning correctly. Interfacing while it is in this state is not advised.

allItems.Name: Boiler Unit
allItems.Description: A small boiler, generating heat to allow the device to function in difficult climates. A malfunction has resulted in a damaging boiler overflow.

allItems.Name: Tiny motor
allItems.Description: A very small motor, designed to power very small parts. It has corroded, and is full of very small rust.

allItems.Name: Cooling system
allItems.Description: A pump and heat exchange system designed to keep the device from overheating. It has itself overheated, and is no longer functional.

allItems.Name: Output screen
allItems.Description: A display terminal designed to communicate the device's status to the user. As the terminal is broken, the user cannot be made aware that the terminal is broken.

allItems.Name: Tamper Prevention Device
allItems.Description: A unit designed to destroy vital systems in the event that the device is tampered with by an unauthorised party. Unfortunately, it has itself malfunctioned and will continue to damage other systems until repaired.

allItems.Name: Security Alarm
allItems.Description: A small light/klaxon hybrid, designed to warn of unauthorised access to the device. Damage to the alarm has caused it to overload and short other nearby circuits.

allItems.Name: Spring Casing
allItems.Description: The casing for a high-compression spring. The casing has ruptured, causing the spring to shoot out and damage the rest of the device.

allItems.Name: Thermoregulator
allItems.Description: A control unit designed to keep temperatures even across the device. The sensor unit is damaged, causing it to vent or generate heat at inappropriate times.

allItems.Name: Fuel Pump
allItems.Description: A high-capacity pump, ensuring that fuel reaches every part of the device in all gravitational conditions. The filter is clogged with a strange substance, causing it to lose power.

allItems.Name: Servo Arm
allItems.Description: A small mechanical joint, used to correct small mechanical errors across the device. A malfunction is causing it to take functional components and push them into the wrong place, creating even more damage.

allItems.Name: Solenoid
allItems.Description: A relay switch, intended to aid the powering up of the device. The connectors have become corroded, and the solenoid is no longer functioning.

allItems.Name: Pressure Chamber
allItems.Description: A small pressurised chamber, designed to create the compressed gas necessary for the device to function. Cracks have appeared in the chamber, causing it to leak.

allItems.Name: Master Circuit
allItems.Description: The control circuit for all the other components in the device. Damage to this circuitry is fatal.

allItems.Name: Power Distributor
allItems.Description: The central power unit for the device. Damage to the unit means it is currently distributing all the power to one particular circuit, causing a dangerous short.

allItems.Name: Load Balancer
allItems.Description: A small unit designed to regulate the flow of power across the device. A malfunction is causing it to short, damaging other components.

allItems.Name: Network Interface
allItems.Description: A universal network interface, allowing the device to connect to a remote control centre. Damage to this interface is causing it to interpret background radiation as network signals, corrupting data in other circuits.

allItems.Name: Safety Panel
allItems.Description: The safety panel seals off potentially dangerous components in the event of a malfunction. An over sensitive trigger has caused it to activate, preventing the device from operating.

allItems.Name: Alternator
allItems.Description: The alternator generates and regulates power for the device. A strange corrosion seeps through it, preventing it from working.

allItems.Name: Photovoltaic Panel
allItems.Description: A small but efficient panel, designed to harvest light and convert it to power. However, the panel is now cracked and dusty, and can no longer be relied on.

allItems.Name: Transmission Box
allItems.Description: The gearing mechanism for the device. The lubricant that keeps it operational appears to have been replaced with an otherworldly green goo, and the gears are now stuck.

allItems.Name: Ancient Lock
allItems.Description: A mysterious lock with several keyholes, this relic protects what must surely be a valuable treasure.

allItems.Name: Pearl Offering
allItems.Description: The chest requires a Living Pearl, harvested from the giant mother-molluscs that grow on the ocean floor.

allItems.Name: Damaged Electrode
allItems.Description:
This Exosuit Upgrade Module is critically damaged. Repair systems to restore upgrade functionality.

If repaired, User will not be charged for any Exosuit Upgrades.

allItems.Name: Shattered Power Core
allItems.Description:
This Exosuit Upgrade Module is critically damaged. Repair systems to restore upgrade functionality.

If repaired, User will not be charged for any Exosuit Upgrades.

allItems.Name: Faulty Hologram
allItems.Description:
This Exosuit Upgrade Module is critically damaged. Repair systems to restore upgrade functionality.

If repaired, User will not be charged for any Exosuit Upgrades.

allItems.Name: Warp Core Resonator
allItems.Description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.

Quantum resonation improves the robustness of the drive during FTL travel, granting the ability to leap to stars previously out of reach.

allItems.Name: Plasmatic Warp Injector
allItems.Description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.

Hyperdrive benefits from advanced fusion that brings starship to higher warp speed and intensity. User's craft will become able to leap deeper into space, and into more distant planetary systems.

allItems.Name: Reality De-Threader
allItems.Description:
An augmentation for the colossal hyperdrive engine of an interstellar freighter.

Uncapped, yet stabilised, fusion systems are threaded into user's hyperdrive. Allows starship to jump ever longer distances in deep space.

allItems.Name: Amplified Warp Shielding
allItems.Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's core bounding magnets, preventing rapid disassembly when attempting to reach rare-class red stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

allItems.Name: Chromatic Warp Shielding
allItems.Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's shield integrity, preventing reality glitches when attempting to reach rare-class green stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

allItems.Name: Temporal Warp Computer
allItems.Description:
Upgrades the hyperdrive's computational matrix,  preventing temporal anomalies when attempting to reach rare-class blue stellar bodies.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems via the Galactic Map.

allItems.Name: Airburst Engine
allItems.Description:
A powerful upgrade for the Exosuit Jetpack, allowing limited jetpack recharging while airborne.

Highly efficient compressors fitted around the jetpack exhaust take advantage of the windflow generated by persistent falling, recycling some of that energy into jetpack fuel.

allItems.Name: Personal Refiner
allItems.Description:
A compact extension to the Exosuit, installing a small Portable Refiner, accessible directly from the user's Exosuit interface.

Unit requires fuel and is limited to refining one substance at a time.

allItems.Name: Instability Drive
allItems.Description:
A highly-advanced upgrade for the Pulse Engine, vastly increasing fuel efficiency.

Tritium supplies are redirected into a cycle of miniature black holes. Resulting micro-gravity fluctuations are harnessed to boost starship propulsion beyond conventional combustion-based approaches.

allItems.Name: Sub-Light Amplifier
allItems.Description:
A highly-advanced upgrade for the Pulse Engine, vastly increasing interplanetary speed.

Naturally occuring frameshift effects within the Pulse Engine are amplified by tritium-based resonators, increasing its maximum sub-light speed.

allItems.Name: Emergency Warp Unit
allItems.Description:
A significant upgrade to the Hyperdrive that allows an instanteous warp even while conventional systems are blocked by starship combat. Access to the emergency warp system is via the Quick Menu.

WARNING: Fast scramble systems mean the user is unable to plot a destination. Uncalculated lightspeed events will damage the unit and require frequent repairs.

allItems.Name: Q-Resonator
allItems.Description: Upgrades the Infra-Knife Accelerator, compressing internal waveforms to allow an extra shot to be weaved in to the conventional fire patterns.

allItems.Name: Hydraulics Damage
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Exploded Panel
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Corroded Tanks
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Burnt-Out Compressor
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Scorched Plating
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Melted Fuel Cell
allItems.Description:
Starship subsystem severely damaged. Slot cannot be used for storage or technology until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Core starship functionality is not affected. Repairing this damage will free slot up for general inventory use.

allItems.Name: Corroded Actuator
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Burnt-Out Terminal
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Melted Servos
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Shattered Lens
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Leaking Membrane
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Failed Resistor
allItems.Description:
Multi-Tool subsystem critically damaged.

Slot cannot be used until damage is repaired. Use REPAIR to begin repair process.

Repairing will free slot up for general use.

allItems.Name: Pulsing Heart
allItems.Description:
A fibrous metallic superstructure binds this warm and vital organ with the core of the ship. Without it, the ship would be nothing, a lifeless husk.

Hold ROLLLEFT and ROLLRIGHT together to ask the heart to initiate a Pulse Jump.
Hold BOOST to request a speed boost.

allItems.Name: Neural Assembly
allItems.Description:
An array of distributed neurons, fused to a board of metallic strands. Complex patterns of electrical impulses weave their way across the surface, knotting each ship system together.
 
Hold THRUST to inquire if the ship would like to take off.

allItems.Name: Singularity Cortex
allItems.Description:
A complex bio-metallic stem plugged directly into an antimatter heart. Registers high activity during interstellar jumps. It appears to delight in the complex calculations required for FTL travel.

Access long-distance navigation systems through Galactic Map. Keep the ship happy by regularly jumping between systems.

allItems.Name: Scream Suppressor
allItems.Description:
This small extension to the ship's automated defense network appears to be its own autonomous organism. A small mouth in the centre of its flesh hungers for Pugneum.

During combat, it seems to hijack the neurological array and prevent fear or pain from traumatising the rest of the ship's body.

allItems.Name: Spewing Vents
allItems.Description:
A mess of sacs and sphincters, these vents generate and expel globules of plasma. When fused to the weapon systems of the ship, these are super-heated and then expelled at high-pressure.

Press SHIPFIRE to ask if the ship would direct its vents towards the current target.

allItems.Name: Grafted Eyes
allItems.Description:
A complex arrangement of membranes and lens, fused atop a high-energy laser array. Incineration awaits those that meet their stare.
Press SHIPFIRE request the eyes gaze upon nearby targets.

allItems.Name: Matter Beam
allItems.Description:
A device that modulates standard freighter communication signals to enable the interplanetary transport of matter as well as data.

Freighters fitted with such a device can send and receive products and substances to a user's Exosuit over a long distance.

allItems.Name: Solar Ray
allItems.Description:
A highly specialised addition to the Multi-Tool's mining capabilities, transforming terrain deposits into liquid sun.

A powerful laser array amplifies local solar radiation, allowing for the rapid reconfiguration of nearby mineral ores.

allItems.Name: Animus Beam
allItems.Description:
A unique overload to the Multi-Tool's standard mining laser. Beam frequency is modulated precisely in a feedback loop with the delta-waves generated by the impact target.

Recordings of the target's experiences are thus etched into tiny fragments of metal and rendered as Fragmented Qualia. Readability of collected fragments is not guaranteed.

allItems.Name: Thermal Buffer
allItems.Description:
Sublimation cooling vents and high-thermal mass buffers are installed in all structural panels, keeping the Exocraft pilot at non-lethal temperatures even in the most overwhelming of firestorms.

Entirely prevents all damage or energy drain while inside an Exocraft in scorched environments.

allItems.Name: Megawatt Heater
allItems.Description:
Installs a powerful heater into the Exocraft, keeping the cabin a habitable temperature even in the most freezing of conditions.

Entirely prevents all damage or energy drain while inside an Exocraft in freezing environments.

allItems.Name: Air Filtration Unit
allItems.Description:
Double-vacuumed air filtration systems allow no trace of the planetary atmosphere into the Exocraft cabin without being thoroughly scrubbed.

Entirely prevents all damage or energy drain while inside an Exocraft in toxic environments.

allItems.Name: Neutron Shielding
allItems.Description:
Highly-efficient control materials are inserted into the frame of the Exocraft, neutralising dangerous incoming energy waves.

Entirely prevents all damage or energy drain while inside an Exocraft in radioactive environments.

allItems.Name: Icarus Fuel System
allItems.Description:
The Icarus system takes advantage of existing metal panelling, upgrading them into photovoltaic surfaces. This reactive coating generates energy during daylight hours, offsetting fuel consumption.

Enables automatic engine recharging during the day.

allItems.Name: Advanced Signal Booster
allItems.Description: Allows for additional building types to be acquired by the Exocraft Signal Booster.

allItems.Name: Daedalus Engine
allItems.Description:
A compact reactor unit, this engine is the heart of the Minotaur. It is mounted on a gyroscope to prevent fuel incidents during rapid movement.

Powered by conventional carbon-base fuels.

allItems.Name: Self-Greasing Servos
allItems.Description:
An automatically-regulated lubricant dispenser fitted to the leg joints of the Minotaur reduce friction and encourage fuel-efficient motion.

Significantly reduces fuel burn in the Minotaur's Daedalus Engine.

allItems.Name: Minotaur Radar Array
allItems.Description:
A high-detail radar device, capable of upgrading the scanner technology aboard the Minotaur to Analysis Visor levels.

Press SCAN to activate a radar sweep, revealing additional points of interest that cannot be located via a Multi-Tool scanner.

Use the Quick Menu to tune the radar to specific buildings.

allItems.Name: Ariadne's Flame
allItems.Description:
A series of agile, high-powered jet thrusters mounted to the rear of the rear of the Minotaur. Precise use allows the Minotaur to quickly and powerfully traverse all manner of terrain.

Press and hold JUMP to activate. Limited in-flight control is possible.

allItems.Name: Minotaur Laser
allItems.Description:
A mounted laser system specifically designed for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

Enables conventional mining operations. Ineffective in combat scenarios.

allItems.Name: Precision Minotaur Laser
allItems.Description:
An upgrade for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid's laser array system.

Amplifies the power deployed by the mining beam, increasing mining speed and enabling the processing of difficult to mine raw materials.

allItems.Name: Minotaur Cannon
allItems.Description:
A mounted cannon specifically designed for the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

Designed primarily for damage against biological entities and inefficient when deployed as a mining device.

allItems.Name: Minotaur Bore
allItems.Description:
Adds Terrain Manipulation capability to the laser array of the Minotaur Heavy Exosuit Hybrid.

A special mount allows the rapid deployment of a high-energy terrain excavator, without risking clogging the Minotaur's delicate joints and servos with dirt.

allItems.Name: Environment Control Unit
allItems.Description:
A powerful environmental neutralising system is plugged directly into the Minotaur pilot when they take control of the vehicle. The system is powered via the Minotaur's main engine unit and requires no additional user inputs. Some minor pain may be noticed around the insertion site.

Renders the Minotaur pilot impervious to all environmental hazards.

allItems.Name: Boltcaster Ricochet Module
allItems.Description:
Creates an antimatter field around the shots of the Boltcaster, causing them to be repelled by non-damaged surfaces.

Enables ricochet, causing projectiles to bounce if they hit a target they do not damage.

allItems.Name: Pulse Spitter Ricochet Module
allItems.Description:
Creates an antimatter field around the shots of the Pulse Spitter, causing them to be repelled by non-damaged surfaces.

Enables ricochet, causing projectiles to bounce if they hit a target they do not damage.

allItems.Name: Incinerator
allItems.Description:
Specialist high temperature weapon attachment for the Multi-Tool. Access fire mode by pressing CYCLEWEAPON and fire weapon with ATTACK.

The Incinerator focuses internal lasers onto the naturally-occuring exhaust gases generated by the Multi-Tool. Ignition results in a highly destructive, if short range, inferno.

allItems.Name: Advanced Launch System
allItems.Description:
A custom-made launch control system for high-performance starships. Sensitive gyroscopes and specialised control circuits plot custom take-off routines for increased launch speed and efficiency.
 
Specialised, deuterium-derived fuel is required to recharge thruster. Launch procedures require sufficient fuel levels before activation.
 
Hold THRUST to take off from planet. Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

allItems.Name: Waveform Engine
allItems.Description:
A highly-tuned version of the conventional starship Pulse Engine. Wavefront occupancy has been pushed to the limit, creating a pulse experience that is both efficient and highly responsive.

User is advised that Tritium is required to charge the drive. Tritium is abundant in near-space asteroid fields.

Hold ROLLLEFT and ROLLRIGHT together to engage Pulse Jump. Hold BOOST to initiate in-flight speed boost.

allItems.Name: Frameshift Catapult
allItems.Description:
This experimental drive augments conventional hyperdrive technology by distorting local geometry at the point of warp initialisation, boosting range and efficiency far beyond standard drives.

User is advised to access Hyperdrive systems through the Galactic Map.

allItems.Name: Pressurisation Capsule
allItems.Description:
A critical starship safety feature, vital for extra-orbital flight.

The pressuration capsule is a dedicated unit that both ensures a breathable atmosphere and prevents the catastrophic explosion of unconventional cockpit designs.

allItems.Name: Visceral Synthesiser
allItems.Description:
A piece of otherworldy technology. Its inviting membranes are soft, gel-like, pulsing with a gentle crimson radiance.

Its warm embrace allows the user to extricate any Vile Spawn from the embryotic sacs of Hungering Tendrils.

allItems.Name: Archive Override Implant
allItems.Description:
A biotechnical firewall, developed as a safeguard against textual cognitohazards. It is coated in something slippery, and has started to bubble along the surface.

Embedded beneath the skin, this grants administrative access to ancient forbidden texts bound at a Planetary Archive.
Warning: Do not unbind the forbidden texts. Exposure to forbidden texts carries extreme risk.

allItems.Name: Solenoid
allItems.Description: A relay switch, intended to aid the powering up of the device. The connectors have become corroded, and the solenoid is no longer functioning.

allItems.Name: Tiny motor
allItems.Description: A very small motor, designed to power very small parts. It has corroded, and is full of very small rust.

allItems.Name: Cooling system
allItems.Description: A pump and heat exchange system designed to keep the device from overheating. It has itself overheated, and is no longer functional.

allItems.Name: Thermoregulator
allItems.Description: A control unit designed to keep temperatures even across the device. The sensor unit is damaged, causing it to vent or generate heat at inappropriate times.

allItems.Name: Servo Arm
allItems.Description: A small mechanical joint, used to correct small mechanical errors across the device. A malfunction is causing it to take functional components and push them into the wrong place, creating even more damage.

allItems.Name: Pressure Chamber
allItems.Description: A small pressurised chamber, designed to create the compressed gas necessary for the device to function. Cracks have appeared in the chamber, causing it to leak.

allItems.Name: Master Circuit
allItems.Description: The control circuit for all the other components in the device. Damage to this circuitry is fatal.

allItems.Name: Power Distributor
allItems.Description: The central power unit for the device. Damage to the unit means it is currently distributing all the power to one particular circuit, causing a dangerous short.

allItems.Name: Transmission Box
allItems.Description: The gearing mechanism for the device. The lubricant that keeps it operational appears to have been replaced with an otherworldly green goo, and the gears are now stuck.

allItems.Name: Photovoltaic Panel
allItems.Description: A small but efficient panel, designed to harvest light and convert it to power. However, the panel is now cracked and dusty, and can no longer be relied on.

allItems.Name: Trident Key
allItems.Description: The chest requires a Trident Key, given to those who study the mysterious sites in the deep ocean.

allItems.Name: Mining Beam
allItems.Description:

The module is flexible, and exact upgrade statistics are unknown until installation is complete.
